'*' matches zero or more characters ('run*' matches 'run', 'runs', and'running', etc.) '?' matches exactly one character ('run?' matches 'runs' and 'rung', but not 'run' or 'running').

'*' matches zero or more characters, from the current position in a given word to its end.
‘*’匹配零个或多个字符，从指定单词的当前位置开始到它结束的部分。

<u0>Apertium</u0> is a free/open-source machine translation platform, initially aimed at related-language pairs, like CA, ES, GA, PT, OC and FR but recently expanded to deal with more divergent language pairs (such as English-Catalan).
<u0>Apertium</u0> 是自由、开源的机器翻译平台，最初致力于相关的语言对，例如 CA、ES、GA、PT、OC 以及 FR，不过最近扩展为能够处理更多的其他语言对（例如英语-加泰罗尼亚语）。
<u0>Belazar</u0> is a Machine language translation tool for the Russian-Belarusian language pair.
<u0>Belazar</u0> 是用于俄罗斯－白俄罗斯语言对的机器语言翻译工具。

<u0>LanguageTool</u0> is an Open Source style and grammar proofreading software for English, French, German, Polish, Dutch, Romanian, and a number of other languages - see the <u1>list of supported languages</u1>.
<u0>LanguageTool</u0>是开源风格的文法较对软件，可用于英语、法语、德语、波兰语、荷兰语、罗马尼亚语及其他语言（请参阅<u1>支持语言列表</u1>）。
<u0>Microsoft Terminology Collection</u0> <i1/> can be downloaded in nearly 100 languages and can serve as a cornerstone IT glossary.
<u0>可以下载Microsoft Terminology Collection</u0> <i1/>它有将近100种语言，可以作为基础的IT词汇表。

A comprehensive suite of utilities for preparing files for translation in a CAT tool.
实用工具套件，可进行CAT工具翻译前的文档准备。

如果被移除的部分与其它片段不匹配，罚分为五分，因此匹配不为100%。
A given source segment may require several different translations, depending on the context.
特定的源片段在不同的语境中可能需要集中不同的翻译。
A good starting point will always be the existing rules.
了解现有的规则总是个很好的起点。
A hint: translating a plain text version of the text and adding the necessary style in the relevant application at a later stage may turn out to be less hassle.
提示：先翻译文本的纯文本版本，稍后再通过相应程序添加必须的风格被证明是更少争议的。

A stemmer for English, for example, should identify the string "cats" (and possibly "catlike", "catty" etc.) as based on the root "cat", and "stemmer", "stemming", "stemmed" as based on "stem".
英语中的词干分析器，例如能识别字符串 "cats"（以及 "catlike", "catty" 等）的词根是 "cat"，而 "stemmer", "stemming", "stemmed" 的词根是 "stem"。
A stemming algorithm reduces the words "fishing", "fished", "fish", and "fisher" to the root word, "fish".
词干分析算法能还原单词 "fishing"、"fished"、"fish" 以及 "fisher" 为相应的词根 "fish"。

All of OmegaT's functions are available through the menu bar at the top of the Editor window.

All preferences protected by the master password will be reset.
受主密码保护的所有偏好设置都将被重置。
All segmentation rule sets for a matching language pattern are active and are applied in the given order of priority, so rules for specific language should be higher than default ones.
为匹配的语言模式定义的所有片段分割规则会按照规定的优先级别得到应用，因此为特定语言定义的规则优先级会比缺省规则要高。
All the languages have access to the OmegaT object model, with the project as the top object.
所有的语言都能访问OmegaT对象模型，其中的顶级对象为项目。
All the user manual files can be found in this folder.
所有的手册文件都在该目录中。
All translations from source documents are also displayed in the Comment pane, in addition to the Match pane.
源片段的所有译文除显示在匹配窗格外，还显示在注解窗格。

可以让您激活/取消激活<e0>翻译提示</e0>功能，并设置<e1>精确匹配</e1>选项。<e2>翻译提示</e2>激活了在原文中突出显示的单词上的右键菜单功能，这样在此单词上点击时将出现含有术语表条目的弹出菜单。

Apertium uses a shallow-transfer machine translation engine which processes the input text in stages, as in an assembly line: de-formatting, morphological analysis, part-of-speech disambiguation, shallow structural transfer, lexical transfer, morphological generation, and re-formatting.
Apertium 使用浅层传播机器翻译引擎（shallow-transfer machine translation engine ）来处理输入的文本，就像汇编行：去除格式，形态分析，语音消歧，浅层结构传播，词汇传播，形态生成以及重新格式化。
Application files: These are included in the package you download.

As a result of this, all settings will be at their defaults, due to which you may experience unexpected, but correct behaviour.

As elsewhere in the OmegaT project, the work of programming OmegaT is done by volunteers, and in keeping with the project philosophy, the developments and improvements they make to OmegaT are ultimately at their discretion.
与OmegaT项目的其他工作一样，OmegaT编程的工作由志愿者完成，并且与项目理念保持一致，他们对OmegaT的发展和改进最终由他们自行决定。

As far as categories are concerned, the de facto industry standard of classifying matches into the following groups is used: Repetitions, Exact match, 95%-100%, 85%-94%, 75%-84%, 50%-74% and No match.
至于相关的分类，下面这些组的分类符合工业标准：重复率、精确匹配、95%-100%、85%-94%、75%-84%、50%-74%和无匹配。

正如其文件名所示，此脚本会将OmegaT（目标）片段中的标签自动去除。

As opposed to user-generated translation memories (as in the case of <a0>OmegaT</a0>) Machine translation (MT) tools use rule-based linguistic tools to create a translation of the source segment without the need for a translation memory.
与用户生成的翻译记忆（就像 <a0>OmegaT</a0>）相对的是机器翻译 (MT) 工具，它使用基于规则的语言学工具而不是翻译记忆来创建源片段的翻译。
As stated above, OmegaT tags are LTR strings.
如上所述，OmegaT 标签是自左向右字符串。

由于这是 PO 文件的标准行为，所以缺省启用。

然而，与自由开发一样，该原则仍然适用，即对OmegaT的任何更改都必须有利于应用程序及其用户。
As you translate your files, <a0>OmegaT</a0> stores your work continually in <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> in the project's /<f2>omegat</f2> subfolder.

At each cursor position rules, consisting of a <e0>Before </e0>and <e1>After </e1>pattern, are applied in their given order to see if any of the<e2> Before</e2> patterns are valid for the text on the left and the corresponding <e3>After</e3> pattern for the text on the right of the cursor.
在每个光标位置，由 <e0>之前</e0>和<e1>之后</e1>的模式组成的规则以指定的顺序应用，即对左边的文本使用<e2>之前</e2>模式同时对光标右边的文本使用 <e3>之后</e3> 模式。

By default the editor displays 2,000 of initial segments, and progressively loads more as you scroll up or down.
默认情况下，编辑器会显示2000个初始段，当你向上滚动或向下滚动时，会逐渐加载更多。
By default, 512 MB are assigned, so there is no advantage in assigning less than this figure.
缺省情况下，将会分配512 MB内存，因此分配低于此大小的内存是没有好处的。
By default, MyMemory allows a maximum of 100 requests per day.
默然情况下，MyMemory每天最多允许发生100条请求。
By default, left justification is used for Left-To-Right (LTR) languages and right justification for Right-To-Left (RTL) languages.
缺省情况下，LTR 语言使用左对齐而 RTL 语言使用右对齐。
By default, scripts are stored in the "scripts" folder located in OmegaT installation folder (the folder that contains the OmegaT.jar).
默认情况下，脚本存储在位于OmegaT安装文件夹（包含OmegaT.jar的文件夹）中的“scripts”文件夹里。
By default, the /tm folder is below the project's root folder (e.g. ...<e0>/MyProject/tm</e0>), but you can choose a different folder in the project properties dialog if you wish.
默认情况下，/tm文件夹位于项目的根文件夹中（例如：...<e0>/MyProject/tm)</e0>，但如果您愿意您也可以在项目属性对话框中选择不同的文件夹。
By default, the Go To Next Untranslated Segment command (Ctrl+U) skips to the next untranslated segment, skipping propagated translations in the process.
默认地，前往下一未翻译片段指令（Ctrl+U）跳转到下一条未翻译的片段，过程中跳过已传输的翻译。
By default, the translated file encoding is the same as the source file encoding.
缺省情况下，已译文件的编码与源文件的编码相同。
By default, under Windows, <l1>omegat.project</l1> is locked, and an error message is received when trying to open a project already opened in another instance of OmegaT.
默认条件下， Windows平台下的 <l1>omegat.project</l1>文件是锁定的，试图打开在另一个OmegaT例子中已经打开的项目会报错。
By deleting a tag group you will remove the related formatting from the translated file.
删除一个标签组的同时，您将会从已译文件中删除相关的格式。
By specifying an email address, it is possible to use 1000 requests per day instead of 100 ones.
电子邮箱经认证后，每天可发送1000条请求。

Depending upon the segmenting rules, the pair of tags may get separated into two consecutive segments and the tag validation will err on the side of caution and mark the two segments.
根据分割规则，标签对可能会被分成两部分并出现在两个连续的片段，而标签检验会检查到这两处的部分标签并提示这两个片段出现错误。

If <e0>Show Relevant Suggestions Automatically</e0> option is checked, Auto-completer is launched automatically by typing the first letter of a translated glossary entry, or by typing "<" in case of tags.
如果<e0>自动显示相关建议</e0>选项被选中，输入首字母、译文术语表中的条目或输入“<"后自动生成器会自动启动。
If <g0>Use Stemming for Glossary Entries</g0> option is ON, with an English source text, the glossary entry "element" will be found if the source text contains "elements".
如果<g0>使用词干提取自术语条目</g0>选项开启，在英文原文中，术语条目 "element" 若在源文件中存在，便会被发现。
If <g0>Use Terms Appearing Separately in the Source Text</g0> option is ON, the glossary entry "itema itemb" will be found in the source text "itema other word itemb".
如果 <g0>源文件使用术语单独显示</g0>选项开启，术语条目 "itema itemb"会在源文件中以 "itema other word itemb"显示。
If <l0>abort </l0>is selected, the tag validator will stop on the first invalid segment.
如果选择了<l0>abort </l0>，则标签验证器会在遇到首个非法片段时停止。
If <l1>warn</l1> is specified, the tag validator will process all segments and write warnings about any segments with invalid tags into the file specified.
如果使用<l1>warn</l1>，则标签验证器会处理所有片段并把含非法标签片段的警告写入指定文件。
If HTML file has the encoding declaration, it will be used disregarding any value you set in this dialog.
对于有编码声明的HTML文件，将会忽略你在此对话框中设置的任何编码值。
If Java is installed at system level and is in the command path, the full path need not be entered.)
如果系统上安装了Java且处于命令行路径中，则无需输入它的完整路径。）

If Options > Editing Behaviour > "Go To Next Untranslated Segment stops when there is at least one alternative translation" is selected however and at least one alternative translation of a non-unique segment has been created, this function treats all instances of that segment (whether default or alternative translations) as untranslated, i.e. does not skip them.
如果选项>编辑行为>“当至少有一种可选翻译时前往下一未翻译片段”被选中，并且一个非独特片段至少创建了一种可选翻译，该功能将该片段的所有实例（不管是默认翻译还是可选翻译）视为未翻译，即不会跳过这些片段。
If a "command not found" or similar message is returned, it is likely that Java is not installed on your system
如果返回了“command not found”或类似的信息，系统很有可能没有安装 Java
If a HHC or HHK file has an encoding declaration, it will be used regardless of any value you specify in this dialog.
对于有编码声明的HHC或HHK文件，将会忽略你在此对话框中设置的任何编码值。
If a file does not load into the <g0>Editor</g0> pane, then it could be that it is in a format that doesn't work in OmegaT.
如果某个文件无法加载到<g0>编辑器</g0>窗格，那么该文件可能是OmegaT无法处理的格式。
If a given sentence has already been translated once, and translated correctly, there is no need for it to be retranslated.
如果指定的片段已翻译过一次且翻译正确，则无需再次翻译它们。
If a user interface in this language is available, <a3>OmegaT</a3> uses it.
如果存在所用语言的界面， <a3>OmegaT</a3> 将会使用它。
If an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project contains one or more glossaries, any terms in the glossary which are also found in the current segment will be automatically displayed in the Glossary viewer.
如果某个 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 项目包含一个或多个术语表文件，当前片段中出现的任何术语将自动显示在术语表查看器中。
If an Internet connection is available, various MT services such as Google Translate and Microsoft Translator can be used from within OmegaT.
如果连接到互联网，OmegaT 还可连接机器翻译服务，如谷歌翻译和 Microsoft Translator。
If an error is found in such a file, OmegaT will indicate the position within the defective file at which the error is located.
如果在文件中发现了错误，则 OmegaT 将提示问题文件中发现错误的位置。
If checked, non-breakable spaces will be displayed with a grey background.
如果选中该选项，不可分割空白符以灰底显示。
If checked, non-unique segments will be marked in pale grey.
如果选中该选项，则非唯一片段会被标记为浅灰色。
If checked, segments with notes will be marked in cyan.
如果选中该选项，则含笔记片段会被标记为青绿色。
If checked, source segments will be shown and marked in green.
如果选中该选项，将会显示源片段并标记为绿色。
If checked, the background of all segments where the target segment has been auto-populated (from TMXs placed in /tm/auto for example) are displayed in colour.
如果选中该选项，所有（根据/tm/auto路径下的TMX文件中的例句）自动填充的片段背景将有颜色。
If checked, the entries are sorted alphabetically.
选中时，条目会按字母顺序排列。
If checked, the longer entries are placed on the list first.
选中时，列表中首先出现较长的条目。
If checked, the translated segments will be marked in yellow.
如果选中该选项，已译片段将会标记为黄色。
If checked, the untranslated segments will be marked in violet.
如果选中该选项，未译片段将会标记为紫色。
If checked, white spaces will be displayed with a small dot.
如果选中该选项，空白符以小点显示。

If for a given source segment there is as yet no existing translation in the project translation memory (project_save.tmx), the current translation will be saved in the project_save.tmx as the default translation.
如果一个片段在项目翻译记忆project_save.tmx中还没有译文，则会把当前译文作为默认译文保存到project_save.tmx中。
If for a given source segment there is no entry for the selected target language, all other target segments are loaded, regardless of the language.
如果一个指定的源片段在选择的目标语言中没有条目，则不考虑语言而加载其他所有目标片段。
If for example the original file is named Document.xx.docx, the following variables will give the following results:
例如如果原始文件名为Document.xx.docx，则变量与其对应的结果如下：
If for some reason these files are lost or corrupted, simply download and/or reinstall OmegaT to restore them all.
如果出于某种原因丢失或损坏了这些文件，仅需下载并重新安装 OmegaT 以恢复它们。
If given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> launches in console mode and translates the given project.
如果给出了该参数，则 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 以控制台模式启动并翻译指定的项目。
If given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> starts in console mode and will translate the given project.
如果给出了该参数，则 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 以控制台模式启动并翻译指定的项目。
If in doubt, don't hesitate to ask project members directly either by sending them an e-mail from the SourceForge page or by sending a public mail to the user group.
如果有任何疑问，请直接向项目成员请教，可通过 Source Forge 页面给他们发送邮件或向用户讨论组发送一份公开邮件。
If issue checking is slow, try disabling some of the optional checks.
如果问题检查进行缓慢，可尝试取消一些可选的检查。
If it is <e0>tar.bz</e0>, you have forgotten to unpack (untar) it.
如果扩展名为<e0>tar.bz</e0>，那是因为您忘记解压了。
If it is clear from the very start, that translations in a given TM (or TMs) are all correct, one can put them into the<e0> tm/auto</e0> folder and avoid confirming a lot of<e1> [fuzzy]</e1> cases.
如果在提供的 TM 中的译文完全可靠的话，那么可以把它们放到 <e0> tm/auto</e0> 目录以避免需要对大量的 <e1> [模糊]</e1>进行确认。
If languages match but not the country, the segments still get loaded.
如果语言匹配但国家不匹配，仍会导入片段。
If later access to the desired location is granted that location will be used and all settings will return to their defaults as a result of the location change.
如果之后要访问的位置得到了许可，将使用该位置 且由于位置变化，所有的设置将会恢复到默认值。
If multiple functions were to be used at the same time in practice, it would be more efficient to combine them in a single script file.
如果现实情况同时要使用多种功能，将这些脚本合并成一个单独文件会更有效率。
If necessary, edit the file names of the dictionary or change your project's language settings.
必要时可编辑词典文件名或改变项目的语言设置。
If neither the language code not the country code match, the segments will be ignored.
如果语言代码和国家代码都不符合，片段将被忽略。
If no text has been selected, the current source segment is written to this file.
如果未选中文本，将导出当前的源片段至该文件。
If no text is selected, <a1>OmegaT</a1> selects the word that contains the letter immediately to the right of the cursor.
如果未选中文本， <a1>OmegaT</a1> 将选中包含了紧挨着光标右边字母的单词。
If not checked, source segments will not be shown.
如果未选中，将不会显示源片段。
If not given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> reverts to default values (<a3>OmegaT</a3> folder under user home or, if unavailable, the current working folder).
如果没有给出该参数，<a2>OmegaT</a2>将转而使用缺省值（即用户主目录中的<a3>OmegaT</a3>文件夹，如果不可用的话则是当前的工作目录）。
If not specified, OmegaT reverts to default values (the OmegaT folder in the user home folder, or if not available: the current working folder).
如果没有给出该参数，OmegaT 将转而使用缺省值（即用户主目录中的OmegaT文件夹，如果不可用的话则是当前的工作目录）。
If not, why not write an article on using OmegaT?
如果没有，为什么不写一篇关于OmegaT使用的文章呢？
If on, when a PO segment (which may be a whole paragraph) is not translated, the translation will be empty in the target file.
如果启用，未翻译的 PO 片段（可能是整个段落）在目标文件中的译文是空的。
If one does not wish to use external TMs for counting, one will either have to empty the /tm folder or change the project setup (temporarily) so that the value for /tm points to a different location.
如果不想使用外部翻译记忆参与统计，可以让 /tm 文件夹为空或临时改变项目设置以让 /tm 指向其他地方。
If only one file is present, check its extension.
如果只有一份与预期相同的文件，那么检查下它的扩展名。
If part of the target segment has been selected, this function overwrites the selected portion.
如果已选中了目标片段的某个部分，则此功能会覆盖那部分。
If sentence segmentation has been selected, you can setup the rules by selecting <m5> <g6><i7/>Options</g6> <g8>Segmentation...</g8> </m5>from the main menu.
如果选用了句子分割，可通过从主菜单选择<m5> <g6><i7/>选项</g6> <g8>片段分割...</g8> </m5>以设置规则。
If some texts are selected within the fuzzy match, only this selection will be inserted at the cursor position.
如果某段文字被选为模糊匹配，那么被选择的部分会在光标处插入。
If some texts are selected within the fuzzy match, only this selection will replace the whole target segment.
如果某段文字被选为模糊匹配，那么只有被选中的部分会被整个目标片段替换。
If spell checking is activated, spelling mistakes and typos are recognized and can be corrected during translation.
如果启用拼写检查功能，翻译过程中 OmegaT 即会辨认拼写错误和错别字并进行修改。
If the Auto-propagation check box is not checked, the segments with alternative translations are left untranslated until the user has decided which translation is to be used.
如果未选中自动传播复选框，则含可选译文的片段会保持未译状态至用户决定使用哪种译文。
If the appropriate filter is found, the file is assigned to it for processing.
如果找到了合适的过滤器，它将被用来处理该文件。
If the automatic installation process does not work: check that your Internet connection is working; if so, try a different repository URL.
如果自动安装流程无法正常进行：检查网络连接是否正常；如果正常，试一下其他仓库URL。
If the current segment is the first one in a file, it moves to the last segment of the previous file.
如果当前片段是文件中的第一个片段，将移动到前个文件的最后一个片段。
If the current segment is the last segment in a file, it moves to the first segment of the next file.
如果当前片段是文件中的最后一个片段，将移动到下个文件的第一个片段。
If the current translation of the segment does not fit, the user can select <g0>Edit → Create Alternative Translation</g0>.
如果片段的当前译文不适合，则用户可选择<g0>编辑→创建可选译文</g0>。
If the document allows, the translator is strongly encouraged to remove style information from the original document so that as few tags as possible appear in the OmegaT interface.
如果允许，极力倡导翻译人员将原始文档的风格信息删除，以确保在 OmegaT 中尽可能少地显示标签。
If the documents are not available, the entry is greyed out.
如果文件不可用，条目会变灰。
If the file already exists, no attempt is done to verify the format or the character set of the file: the new entries will always be in tab-separated format and UTF-8.
如果该文件已存在，不会对其格式或字符集进行检查：新条目总是以tab分隔并使用UTF-8编码。

If the files to be translated are parts of a tree structure (as in a website), you need only specify the top-level subfolder and OmegaT will maintain the entire contents, while keeping the tree structure intact.
如果要翻译的文件是结构树的一部分（例如网站上的文件），您只需指定最上级子目录，而 OmegaT 将会保持完整的树形结构和全部内容。
If the filter has any options, you may change them by clicking Options.
如果过滤器有可选项，你可以通过点击选项来改变它们。
If the language of the user's system is not available, <a6>OmegaT</a6> defaults to English.
如果不存在用户系统的语言，<a6>OmegaT</a6>缺省使用英语。
If the option is OFF, the glossary entry above will not be found.
如果关闭此选项，上述术语条目将无法找到。
If the option is off, the source text will be copied to the target segment.
如果关闭了此选项，则会复制源文本到目标片段中。
If the original document was LTR, the display direction of the target document must be changed manually to RTL in its viewing application.
如果源文档是自左向右的，目标文档的显示方向可以在其查看程序中手动修改为自右向左。
If the parameter is not specified, all files will be processed.
如果未使用该选项，则处理所有文件。
If the project language codes and the tmx language codes fully match, the segments are loaded in memory.
如果项目语言代码和 TMX 语言代码完全匹配，片段将会导入内存中。
If the rule matches, either the cursor moves on without inserting a segment break (for an exception rule) or a new segment break is created at the current cursor position (for the break rule).
如果规则匹配，光标继续移动而不进行分割（对于例外规则）或者创建一个新片段（为中断规则）。
If the source file is modified after you have begun translating, <a1>OmegaT</a1> may be unable to find a segment that you have already translated.
如果在开始翻译后对源文件进行了修改，<a1>OmegaT</a1> 也许会找不到您已经翻译的某个片段。
If the source segment in one of the ancillary TMs is identical to the text being translated, OmegaT acts as defined in the <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Editing Behavior...</g2> </m0> dialog window.
如果某个辅助TM中的某个源片段与待译的文本完全相同，OmegaT会安装在<m0> <g1>选项</g1> <g2>编辑行为...</g2> </m0>对话框中的设置进行操作。

If the spell checker is not working, then make sure first that the check box <g0>"Automatically check the spelling of text"</g0> in the spell checker dialog (<g1>Options > Spell checking...)</g1> is checked.
如果拼写检查器没有运行，首先确保选中了拼写检查器对话框（<g1>选项>拼写检查...</g1>）中<g0>“自动检查文本拼写”</g0>的复选框。
If the text is encoded in 8 bits, however, one can be faced with the following awkward situation: instead of displaying the text, for Japanese characters...
然而，如果文本使用 8 位编码，那么可能会遇到这样困惑的情况：不是显示日文的文本...

If the translation for several identical source segments already exists in the translation memory of the project, these segments, together with other, already translated unique segments, will be classified as an "Exact match".
如果在项目的翻译记忆中存在多个相同源片段的译文，这些及其他已译唯一片段将被归类为“精确匹配”。
If the value is <l1>abort</l1>, then on tag errors the errors are printed and the program stops.
如果该参数值为 <l1>abort</l1>，那么在遇到标签错误时打印出错误，同时程序停止。
If the value is <l2>warn</l2> then the errors are printed but OmegaT continues.
如果该参数值为 <l2>warn</l2>，则打印错误且 OmegaT 继续执行。
If there are other files named test.html in other folders, they will be ignored.
如果在其子目录下有名为test.html的文件，它们会被忽略。
If there's no file name displayed, the source is the internal project translation memory.
如果未显示文件名，则发现匹配的源为缺省项目的翻译记忆。
If there's nothing appearing in the Machine Translate pane, then check the following:
如果在机器翻译窗格中没有出现任何东西，检查下列内容：
If there's several alternative translations available for the active segment, you can label the alternative selected as the default translation.
如果当前片段有多个可选译文，您可以标记所选择的译文为缺省译文。
If they are accidentally changed, the formatting of the final file may be corrupted.
如果它们被意外地改变，最终的文件格式也许会被破坏。
If they are used by some other application on your system, they will disappear from that application, too.
如果系统上有其他程序使用它们，则它们也会从那些程序中消失。
If they do not conflict with system shortcuts, they should be available from within OmegaT.
不会和系统快捷键冲突的话，它们在OmegaT中应该有效了。
If this is not the case, open the main dialog by selecting<e0> Options → File Filters...</e0> from the main menu.
如果不满意，可以从主菜单<e0>选项→文件过滤器...</e0>打开主对话框。
If this option is checked, when a fuzzy match is inserted, either manually or automatically, OmegaT attempts to convert the numbers in the fuzzy matches according to the source contents.
选中该选项后，在手动或自动插入模糊匹配时，OmegaT会尝试根据源文本转换模糊匹配中的数字。
If used, neither the user's decision to accept the translation nor the final translation are made available to Google.
如果用了，既不表示用户要接受该译文，更不表示最终译文会提供给谷歌。

If we want to avoid any mis-translations in case of segments with several possible target contents, checking this check box will cause <e0>Go To Next Untranslated Segment</e0> to stop on the next such segment, irrespective of whether it has already been translated or not.
如果我们希望在有多个可能的目标语文本的情况下避免错译，选中此复选框 <e0>前进到下一个未译片段</e0>将在下一个片段停止，其是否被翻译对此无影响。
If you add a prefix (for instance [fuzzy]), you can trace those translations later to see they are correct.
如果您加上了前缀（例如[模糊]），之后您可以找到这些译文并检查是否正确。
If you already have a version of OmegaT installed on your PC and wish to upgrade to a more recent version, you have two options:
如果您已经在电脑上安装了某个版本的 OmegaT 且希望升级到最新的版本，有两种方法：
If you already have collected words you wish the spell checker to ignore / accept, you just need to copy the corresponding two files into the <f0>omegat</f0>subfolder of your current project.
如果您已经收集了希望拼写检查器忽略/接受的单词，只需复制相应的两个文件到当前项目的<f0>omegat</f0>子目录。

If you are already reasonably familiar with computers in general and choose a straightforward scripting language like Javascript or Tcl/Tk, you could teach yourself enough to be able to write simple but useful scripts within just a couple of weeks.
如果你已经了解了电脑，选择一种简单的脚本语言例如 Javascript 或者Tcl/Tk，通过可以自学，可以在几周内写出简单又有用的脚本。
If you are in any doubt, we recommend that you use the version supplied with JRE.
如果还是有疑问，我们建议您使用附带了 JRE 的版本。
If you are interested in modifying or distributing <a1>OmegaT</a1>, read this document carefully and ensure you understand its implications before doing anything.
如果您有兴趣修改和发布 <a1>OmegaT</a1>，请仔细查阅该文档并确保在进行操作前掌握其全部含义。
If you are interested in other settings of this dialog, you can return to it any time by pressing <k0>Ctrl+E.</k0>
如果对该对话框中的其他设置有兴趣，您可在任何时候按下<k0>Ctrl+E</k0>来将其打开。
If you are not very familiar with Linux, we therefore recommend that you install an OmegaT version with JRE included.
如果对 Linux 不是很熟悉的话，我们建议安装带有 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本。

If you are serious about learning tcl/tk, "Practical Programming in Tcl and Tk" by Brent Welch, ISBN: 0-13-038560-3 is strongly recommended.
如果你是非常认真地想要学习tcl/tk，强烈推荐Brent Welch编写的《Practical Programming in Tcl and Tk》 ， ISBN: 0-13-038560-3.
If you are supplied with previously created translation memories , for example by your translation agency or your client, OmegaT is able to use these as reference memories.
如果您手头有事先创建好的译法记忆文件，比如说是翻译公司或客户提供给您的译法记忆，OmegaT 也可以使用这些文件作为翻译参考。
If you are unable to run <a0>OmegaT</a0> normally (no graphical environment available): copy the settings files from some other <a1>OmegaT</a1> installation on another machine to a specific folder.
如果您无法正常运行<a0>OmegaT</a0>（没有可用的图形界面）：可将另一机器上安装的<a1>OmegaT</a1>设置文件复制到指定文件夹。
If you are using an authenticated proxy, please enter here your user and password.
如果用的是需要认证的代理服务器，请输入用户名和密码。

如果您觉得丢失了翻译数据，那么可以参照下列步骤恢复项目到最近保存的数据，通常是大约 10 分钟以内：

如果您认为丢失了翻译数据，可执行下列步骤：

如果您无法看到所有窗格（处于打开或最小化状态），按下<g0>选项>恢复主窗口</g0>将把它们恢复为原始状态。
If you can program in another language, you can write code to support the core application.
如果你会其他编程语言，可以编写代码支持核心应用。
If you can see the file OmegaT but not OmegaT.exe in your File Manager (Windows Explorer), change the settings so that file extensions are displayed.
如果您能在文件管理器（Windows资源管理器）中看到OmegaT但没有OmegaT.exe文件，请修改此设置以显示文件扩展名。
If you can't run <a0>OmegaT</a0> normally (no graphical environment available): copy the settings files from some other <a1>OmegaT</a1> installation on another machine to a specific folder.
如果您无法正常运行<a0>OmegaT</a0>（没有可用的图形界面）：可将另一机器上安装的<a1>OmegaT</a1>设置文件复制到特定的文件夹。
If you change segmentation options when a project is open, you must reload the project in order for the changes to take effect.
如果您在项目打开的时候改变分割规则选项，您必须重新载入项目以使改变生效。
If you check the corresponding checkbox, the OmegaT.l4J.ini file is modified to use the language selected (see next section for details).
如果您选中了相应的复选框，则会修改OmegaT.l4J.ini文件以使用选择的语言（请参阅下一部分了解详情）。
If you do not already have an Azure Marketplace account you will need to register one first.
如果您还没有Azure Marketplace账户，您首先需要注册一个账户。
If you do not wish <a0>OmegaT</a0> to send your source segments to Google to get translated, untick the Google Translate menu entry in Options.
如果不希望 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 把源片段发送至谷歌获取译文，请取消选项菜单中的谷歌翻译菜单项。
If you enter names of folders that do not exist yet, <a0>OmegaT</a0> creates them for you.
如果您输入了还不存在的文件夹名称，则 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 会创建它们。
If you export using the system option "Tab-delimited export", you will need to delete the first 5 columns (Seq.
如果使用 "Tab-delimited export" 系统选项导出，您必须删除头 5 列（包括
If you find the suggestion acceptable, press <k0> <k1><i2/>Ctrl</k1> <k3>M</k3> </k0> to replace the target part of the opened segment with the suggestion.
如果发现了可接受的建议，按下 <k0> <k1><i2/>Ctrl</k1> <k3>M</k3> </k0> 可使用它替换已打开片段的目标部分。

If you have TransTips option activated (<g0>Options → TransTips</g0>), you can right click on the highlighted word in the source segment to open a pop-up menu with suggested translation, as offered by your glossary.
如果您激活<g0>选项→翻译提示</g0>中的翻译提示，那么可在源片段中突出显示的单词上点击右键来打开包含由术语表提供的可选译文的弹出菜单。

If you have a PDF file made of scanned pages (sometimes such files are referred to as ‘dead’ PDFs), you need to use an OCR (optical character recognition) program to recognize the text and convert it to a format that can be handled by OmegaT.
如果您有一个由扫描页面组成的PDF文件（有时这些文件被称为“死”PDF文件），您需要使用OCR（光学字符识别）程序来识别文本并将其转换为可由OmegaT处理的格式。
If you have a powerful machine, and/or if you don't like how the scrollbar behaves during progressive loading, you can increase this number.
如果您有一个强大的设备，并且/或者如果您不喜欢滚动条逐步加载的行为，您可以通过增加数字来实现。.
If you have already Java installed on your system, one way to install OmegaT is to use Java Web Start.
如果已经装了 Java，安装 OmegaT 的途径之一是使用 Java Web Start。
If you have already Java, one way to install the current version of OmegaT is to use Java Web Start.
如果已经装了 Java，安装当前版本 OmegaT 的途径之一是使用 Java Web Start。

If you have already translated a large body of text, and then realize the target language code of the project does not match the spell checker's language code (you specified pt_BR as the language, but there are no pt_BR vocabularies, for instance) you can simply copy the two corresponding files and rename them (e.g. from <e0>pt_PT.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> to <e2>pt_BR.aff</e2> and <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>).
如果已经译了一大段文本，但是才意识到项目的目标语言代码与拼写检查器的语言代码不符（如将pt_BR设为目标语言，但没有pt_BR术语表），您只需复制两份对应的文件并进行重命名（例如把<e0>pt_PT.aff</e0>和<e1>pt_PT.dic</e1>改名为<e2>pt_BR.aff</e2>和<e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>）。

If you have already translated an instance of a non-unique segment and wish to make a different instance of the non-unique segment the default translation without changing the translation of the instance you have already translated, you must first set the status of the segment you have already translated to "alternative translation" using "Create Alternative Translation".
如果你已经翻译过一例非独特片段，并且希望为这非独特片段制作一种不同的默认翻译，同时还不想改变已经翻译过的实例的译文，你必须先用“创建可选翻译”将已翻译片段设定为“可选翻译”状态，
If you have an existing terminology handling system it is quite possible it offers the export of terminology data via TBX format.
如果你已经有术语处理系统，那它很可能提供通过 TBX格式到处术语数据。.
If you have found OmegaT useful and would like to express your gratitude by making a <a0>donation</a0> on our Paypal account.
如果你觉得OmegaT很有用，并且想要表达感谢，可以 <a0>捐赠</a0>在我们的paypal账号。
If you have made changes to your<f0> OmegaT.l4J.ini </f0>file and/or are using a .bat file, you must copy these over.
如果您对 <f0> OmegaT.l4J.ini </f0> 进行了修改或使用 .bat 文件，那么必须把它们复制过去。
If you have the source and the target Properties files for one and the same contents in your language pair, this procedure will create a corresponding tmx file for these contents.
如果您有以您需要的语言对表示的源和目标属性文件，这个过程将创建包含这些内容的 TMX 文件。
If you haven't yet saved the project, this manually confirms whether you really wish to quit.
如果您未手动保存项目，系统将会让您确认是否真要要退出。
If you install a version of Java at system level, you must either ensure that it is in your launch path, or call it explicitly when launching OmegaT.
如果在系统级安装了某个版本的 Java，你要么确保它处于启动路径当中， 要么必须在启动 OmegaT 时明确地对它进行调用。
If you later change filters, only the project filters will be updated, while the user filters stay unchanged.
如果以后您改变了过滤器，则只更新当前项目的过滤器而用户过滤器保持不变。

If you modify the project segmentation or delete files from the source, some matches may appear as <e1>orphan strings</e1> in the Match Viewer: such matches refer to segments that do not exist any more in the source documents, as they correspond to segments translated and recorded before the modifications took place.
如果您修改了项目的分割规则或从源中删除了文件，那么在匹配查看器中可能出现<e1>孤立字符串</e1>。这样的匹配指向源文档中不存在的片段，而是指向修改发生前的片段记录。
If you need altered settings, the configuration files must be available.
如果需要变更设置，必须提供配置文件。
If you need assistance with any aspect of OmegaT, feel free to join the <u1>OmegaT users group.</u1>
如果您需要关于OmegaT某些方面的帮助，可随时加入<u1>OmegaT用户组</u1>。
If you need non-standard settings, the corresponding configuration files (<l0>filters.conf</l0> and <l1>segmentation.conf</l1>) must be present.
如果不使用标准设置，则必须提供相应的配置文件（<l0>filters.conf</l0>和<l1>segmentation.conf)</l1>）。

如果您需要在翻译中复制文本格式（以及其他东西，如绘图），有三种方法可以尝试：
If you need to see tags in OmegaT but do not need to retain most of the formatting in the translated document you are free not to include tags in the translation.
如果需要在 OmegaT 中看到标签，但是却不需要在已译文档中保留绝大多数格式的话，可以不向译文中添加任何标签。
If you only have a Bolivian Spanish dictionary available, with the file names es_BO.dic and es_BO.aff, you can rename these files es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff, and the spelling dictionary will work.
如果你只有玻利维亚西班牙语词典，文件名为es_BO.dic和es_BO.aff。你可以将这些文件改名为es_MX.dic和es_MX.aff，拼写检查词典也可以正常工作。

If you only have a standard Spanish dictionary available, with file names es_es.dic and es_es.aff for instance, you can copy these files to es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff, and the spelling dictionary will work.
如果您只有标准的西班牙语词典（例如文件名为es_es.dic和es_es.aff），您把这些文件改名为es_MX.dic和es_MX.aff也能让拼写检查词典正常工作。
If you only need textual information (and not formatting information), use the level 1 file that OmegaT has created.
如果您只需要文本信息（而不是格式信息），可以使用 OmegaT 创建的级别 1 文件。

如果您 (位于任何窗格中)在按<k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>Shift</k2> <k3>G</k3> </k0>前，选择了文本中的一串字符 ，选中文本将根据默认粘贴到 <g4>源于术语</g4> 字段。
If you start <a1>OmegaT</a1> in console mode, it will use the same settings.
如果以控制台模式启动 <a1>OmegaT</a1>，它将使用相同的设置。
If you start <a1>OmegaT</a1> in console mode, it will use the settings you configured.

If you want to use the same language in OmegaT as the one used during installation, check the box below.
如果要在 OmegaT 中使用安装时所用的语言，请勾选下面的方框。
If you wish to keep track of what is happening to the report, register as a SourceForge user, login and file a bug report or simply click Monitor at the top of the report.
如果您想知道您的报告后续处理情况，您需要注册成为 SourceForge 用户，登录并提交一份 BUG 报告，或者只需点击报告顶部的监控器。

如果您想恢复到缺省的过滤器设置，点击<e2>缺省</e2>。您也可以在文件过滤器对话框中的目标文件名模式字段中直接修改名称。
If you wish to use such files as reference translations in OmegaT, they must be repaired, or OmegaT will report an error and fail to load them.
如果您想在 OmegaT 中使用这样的文件作为参考翻译，您必须对它们进行修补，否则 OmegaT 会加载失败并报告错误。

如果您已安装的程序是“带 JRE 的 Windows”版本，那么新的安装程序也必须是“带 JRE 的 Windows”版本。

如果您设置了规则集来处理语言——国家对，我们建议您使用<e2>上移</e2>按钮将它移到顶部。

如果源文件是格式化文件，如Microsoft Word、LibreOffice Writer或HTML，OmegaT会把待译文本周围的格式转换为标签。

Ignore file context when identifying segments with alternate translations: by default, OmegaT uses the source file name as part of the identification of an alternate translation.

在其他情况下（即不使用此参数时）不会进行标签验证操作。

无论是精确还是关键词搜索，都可以使用通配符 '*' 和 '?'。
In case no tokenizer exists for the current languages, OmegaT uses Hunspell instead (in that case, make sure that relevant Hunspell dictionaries are installed).

In case of OmegaT complete project folders - in other words the translation memories involved as well as source folders, project settings etc - are managed by the selected RCS.
在OmegaT中完整的项目文件夹（即包含翻译记忆、源文件夹、项目设置等）都由所选的RCS进行管理。
In case of PO files, a 20% penalty applied to the alternative translation (i.e., a 100% match becomes an 80% match).
如果是PO文件，会对可选译文应用20%的罚点（即100%的匹配度变成80%）。

在文件名存在疑义的情况下，其中某个可以适用于<l0>${仅文件名</l0><e1>-扩展数字</e1>} and <l2>${扩展名</l2>-<e3>扩展数字} </e3>形式的变量。

In case there are non-unique segments in source documents, the Auto-propagation check box offers the user the following two possibilities as regards automatic translation: if checked, the first translated segment will be assumed as the default translation and its target text will be automatically used for later hits during the translation process.
源文档中包含非唯一片段时，自动传播翻译复选框为用户提供了下面两种类似自动翻译的功能：选中时，首次翻译的片段将被假定为默认翻译，其目标文本会自动用于以后翻译过程中的提示。
In case you decide to modify project folders, keep in mind that this will not move existing files from old folders to the new location.
如果您要修改项目文件夹，必须紧记这样做并不会将现有的文件从旧文件夹移动到新的位置。
In case, however, the same source segment already exists with a different translation, the new translation will be saved as an alternative.
然而如果相同的源片段已经存在不同的翻译，则新译文会被保存为可选译文。
In cases like these it becomes necessary to switch to RTL mode, so that the RTL (in fact bidirectional) text is displayed correctly.
在像这样的情况下，必须转换为自右向左模式，以正确显示自右向左（实际是双向）文本。
In cases where a team of translators is involved, translators will prefer to share common translation memories rather than distribute their local versions.

在文件中新增的术语保存后不会马上被发现。
接着，<g0>项目文件</g0>对话框出现。
No action is taken, if no Machine Translation service has been activated (see Menu > Options below).
如果未激活机器翻译服务（参阅下面的 菜单 > 选项），将不会有任何动作。
No action, if machine tools are deactivated (see Menu > Options > Machine Translate)
如果未激活机器翻译服务（参阅下面的 菜单 > 选项 > 机器翻译），将不会有任何动作。
No connection available, the project is in offline mode.
连接无效，项目处于离线模式。
No glossary file found in the "glossary" folder.
"glossary" 目录中没有找到术语表文件。
搜索未发现任何匹配内容。
No need to save project, because no changes were made
由于未作修改，无需保存项目。
No new dictionaries available at the remote server.
远程服务器没有提供的新字典。
没有脚本被绑定到位置 #{0} 。
Non-visible formatting (i.e., which doesn't appear as tags in the OmegaT editor) is retained in target documents.
不可见的格式信息（即在OmegaT编辑器中不显示为标签的那些）会保留在目标文档中。
Normally tags are ignored when considering the similarity between different texts for matching purposes.
一般情况下，为匹配目的而比较不同文本的相似性时将忽略标签。
Normally, it is not necessary to start <a0>OmegaT</a0> from the command line.
正常情况下，没有必要从命令行启动 <a0>OmegaT</a0>。
Not only may it be used free of charge, users are also free to make copies of it and distribute them.
用户不仅可以免费使用，还可以免费复制和分发。
Not to mention his care and diligence, keeping repositories intact and in good order.
还必须提及他的细心和努力保持了代码库的完整和良好顺序。
Note <e0>interesar</e0> and<e1> navegar</e1> in Spanish, are correctly translated as the verbs interest and sail respectively.
注意西班牙语中的 <e0>interesar</e0> 和 <e1> navegar</e1> 被正确地翻译成动词 "interest" 和 "sail"。
Note also that some fonts behave better for some language pairs than for others.
同时，就某些语言而言，某些字体比另一些的表现更佳。

Note however that the numbers do not indicate how relevant the repetitions are: they could mean relatively long sentences repeated a number of times (in which case you are fortunate) or it could describe a table of keywords (not so fortunate).
但是请注意：该数字并未透露这些重复的相关性，它们可能是多次重复的相当长的句子（此时是幸运的）或关键字表格（不那么幸运了）。
Note that '*' and '?' have special meaning in regular expressions, so wild card search, as described here, applies to exact and keyword search only (see below).
需要注意‘*’和‘?’在正则表达式中有特殊含义，所以这里所说的通配符搜索只适用于精确搜索和关键字搜索（见下文）。
Note that <f0>Remove</f0> physically removes the selected vocabularies.
注意<f0>删除</f0>实际上只是删除了选择的术语表。
注意<l0>后模式</l0>规则是空的
Note that Google Translate service is not free of charge, see chapter <l1>Installing and Running</l1> (runtime parameters) for more on that.
注意谷歌翻译服务需要付费，请参阅<l1>安装和运行</l1>章节（运行时参数）了解更多相关信息。
Note that all parameters start with a double - character.
请注意所有的参数都以两个 - 字符开始。
Note that all the tmx files in the /tm repository are parsed when the project is opened, so putting all different TMs you may have on hand into this folder may unnecessarily slow OmegaT down.
注意在程序启动时，/tm 仓库中的所有 TMX 文件将会被解析，因此将手头所有的 TMX 文件导入将会不必要地减慢 OmegaT 的运行。
Note that all the translation memories are loaded into memory when the project is opened.
注意：打开项目时会把所有的翻译记忆加载到内存中。
Note that bug reports and requests for enhancements are publicly visible, so you should not add any sensitive files.
需要注意的是：BUG 报告和改进要求是公开可见的，因此请不要将敏感文件加入其中。
Note that changes to the project setup may have some consequences, especially, when the project has already been started.
请注意对项目设置的变更可能已经产生结果，特别是在重新加载项目后。
Note that default segmentation rules and file filters can be overridden by project-specific setup (see above).
注意默认的分割规则和文件过滤器可以被项目专用设置所覆盖（见上文）。
Note that if you need or wish to use any of the launch command arguments (see above), you must use the normal installation.
请注意，如果您需要某个启动命令参数（见上文），就不得不使用正常安装。
Note that in Windows you can change the <f3>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f3> file to reflect your preferences.
注意在Windows中你可以改变<f3>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f3>文件来反应你的偏好。
Note that in addition to "source-target" dictionaries you can, using the Dictionary feature, obtain access to information such as:
注意除了可以使用“原文-译文”类型的词典之外，通过词典功能还可以访问下列资源：
Note that in some cases changes in file filters in <a1>OmegaT</a1> may lead to totally different segmentation; as a result, you will have to upgrade your translation manually in such rare cases.
注意：修改<a1>OmegaT</a1>中的文件过滤器在某些情况下可能会导致完全不同的片段分割结构，结果在少数情况下您必须手动更新译文。
Note that in the above case, this is just half (or even less) of the story, as the target language (Slovenian) uses declension.
必须注意在这种情况中，到这里只说到一半（甚至更少），因为目标语言（斯洛文尼亚语）具有词形变化。
Note that in the menu <g2>Options->File Filters</g2>, the global user filters are changed, not the project filters.
注意在<g2>选项->文件过滤器</g2>菜单中，修改的是全局用户过滤器而不是项目专用过滤器。
Note that nothing but your source segment is sent to the MT service.
注意，除了源片段外不会将其他任何内容发送至机器翻译服务。
Note that only one TMX for a given language pair is possible, so if several translation memories should be involved, you will need to merge them all into the XX_YY.tmx.
请注意，对于指定的语言对只有一个TMX是可行的，所以当应该包含多个翻译记忆时您需要将它们全部合并到XX_YY.tmx。
Note that other CAT tools can export (and import as well) tmx files, usually in all three forms.
注意：其他 CAT 也能导出（以及导入）TMX 文件，一般也有三种形式。
Note that the "Install" function requires an Internet connection.
请注意“安装”功能需要网络连接。
Note that the TMX files in the tm folder can be compressed with gzip.
注意在tm文件夹中的TMX文件可使用gzip压缩。
Note that the creator of the repository has implicitly the administrator rights for the repository created.
请注意版本库的创建者默认具有他所创建的版本库的管理权限。
Note that the key is 38 characters long.
请注意该密钥长度为 38 个字符。
Note that the opening tag must always come before the corresponding closing tag:
请注意开标签总是出现在闭标签的前面：
Note that the structure of the source subfolder may take any form you like.
要注意的是source子目录的结构完全由您决定。
Note that the team members have to be registered first, before you can add them to the project (Note: in the free version of ProjectLocker you are allowed only two users per project).
需要注意的是团队成员必须先注册，您才能把他们添加到项目中（注意：在ProjectLocker的免费版本中每个项目只允许添加两个成员）。
Note that they are all web-based: you will have to be on-line if you want to use them.
需要注意的是它们都是基于网络：您必须在线才能使用它们。
Note that this will of course check for the standard (Castillian) rather than for Mexican Spanish.
请注意，除墨西哥式西班牙语外这时也会检查标准的卡斯提尔语。
Note that up to 2M characters per month are free of charge.
注意免费账户每月最多可用2M字符数。
Note that you can reassign the shortcuts to your own preferences.
请注意，您可以按自己的偏好重新分配快捷键。
Note that you segments from order1, that are not present in order2 and other subsequent jobs, will be tagged as orphan segments; however, they will still be useful for getting fuzzy matches.
需要注意存在于order1而不在order2或后续任务中的片段，会被标记为孤立片段，不过这样仍可用来获取模糊匹配。
Note that you will need the ant program (<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>) to build your own version of OmegaT.
请注意您还需要 ant 程序（<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>）来编译 OmegaT。
Note: All of the segmentation rule sets with a matching Language Pattern are applied in the given order.
注意：和匹配语言模式一起设置的分段规则集合将会以给出的顺序应用。

Note: DocBook files are recognized not only by file extension, but they also must have a DOCTYPE declaration: <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML... for DocBook 4, or a Namespace: xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" for DocBook 5
注意：DocBook 文件不仅仅根据文件扩展名判断。这些文件必须同时包括 DOCTYPE 声明： <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML... （对于 DocBook 4），或者是 Namespace: xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" （对于 DocBook 5）
Note: Items that are found in most applications (copy/cut/paste) are not displayed in this menu, but are available using your system shortcuts.
注意：在多数程序中可以找到的（复制/剪切/粘贴）条目没有出现在这个菜单中，但是您可以通过系统快捷键使用。
Note: OmegaT does not interact dynamically with them (you must export/import TMX files manually).
提示： OmegaT不能动态与翻译记忆文件关联（您必须手动导入/导出TMX文件）。
Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HHC and HHK files that do not contain an encoding declaration.
注意：源文件编码设置至影响内部没有编码声明的 HHC 和 HHK 文件。
Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HTML files that have no encoding declaration inside.
注意：源文件编码设置只影响内部没有编码声明的 HTML 文件。
Note: colors are customizable through the <g0>Options / Custom colours...</g0> dialog.
提示：颜色可在 <g0>选项/个性化颜色</g0> 中定制。
Note: in that case, <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1> can still be used, to force a Machine Translation call on an already translated segment.
提示：在上述情况中，<k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>M</k3> </k1>仍可用以为已翻片段获取机器翻译。
Note: not all filters allow you to select an encoding.
注意：并非所有的过滤器允许选择某种编码。
Note: on Windows it seems that this manual font fallback mechanism can interfere with standard font fallback, causing undesirable font substitution.
提示：Windows操作系统中手动选择备用字体可能会影响标准备用字体，导致不理想的字体替换。
Note: the <f0>.tbx</f0> output of MultiTerm seems to not be reliable (November 2013), it is better to use the <f1>.tab</f1> output of MultiTerm instead.
注意：<f0>MultiTerm导出的.tbx格式</f0>文件似乎不太可靠（2013年11月），建议使用MultiTerm的<f1>.tab</f1>文件。

Nothing speaks against using Notepad++ on Windows, GEdit on Linux for instance or some spreadsheet program for this purpose: any application, that can handle UTF-8 (or UTF-16 LE) and that can show white space (so that you do not miss the required <k1>TAB</k1> characters) can be used.
在Windows平台上使用 Notepad++，在Linux平台上使用 GEdit， 或者用电子表格完成都是可以的：任何能处理 UTF-8 (或者UTF-16 LE) ，以及能能显示空格（你不会漏掉必要的 <k1>TAB</k1> 字符）的应用都可以使用。
Nothing, but ends quoting started by \Q
什么都不匹配，但结束由 \Q 开始的引用
Nothing, but quotes all characters until \E
什么都不匹配，但是引用 \E 之前的所有字符
Nothing, but quotes the following character.
什么都不匹配，但对以下字符进行引用。
Notify Me When a Segment Has Multiple Translations
编号, 创建日期等等）。
Number of the match from 1 to 5

tu.note: Nuosu为彝人或彝族，这里为语言就用彝语了

tuv.seg: ODFAuthors and LibreOffice's Italian translators are proud to use such a good tool for their hard work within the LibreOffice Community.
ODF的作者和LibreOffice 的意大利语译者对于可以使用这样一款好用的工具来处理LibreOffice社区的繁重工作，感到很满足。
Obtain the .dic and .aff files of the dictionary you wish to use, and place these files in this folder.
获取想要使用的字典的.dic和.aff文件，把这些文件放入此文件夹。
Of course it is much wiser, to take a short break and download the correct versions of the spell checker.
当然，中断一小段时间并下载正确的拼写检查器版本的做法更加理智。
Of course, the encoding must be compatible with both the languages contained, so Unicode is recommended.
当然，编码必须和术语语言兼容，因此建议使用Unicode码。
Of interest for advanced users only!
这些内容为感兴趣的高级用户准备的！
Often documents will also have tags that have nothing to do with formatting, but which are also important in the source files (and in the translated files).
经常文档都会含有无需处理的格式标签，但它们对源文件（和已译文件）也很重要。
Old Church Slavonic, Church Slavic, Church Slavonic, Old Bulgarian, Old Slavonic
古教会斯拉夫语、教会斯拉夫语、古斯拉夫语
OmegaT allows to run scripts written in different scripting languages.
OmegaT 允许运行使用不同脚本语言发布的脚本.
OmegaT allows you to do this by marking the characters/words that have a special formatting with easy-to-handle tags.
通过使用易于维护的 TAG 来标记拥有特殊格式的字符或单词，OmegaT 让您能够做到这一点。
OmegaT also backs up the translation memory to project_save.tmx.YEARMMDDHHNN.bak in the same subfolder each time a project is opened or reloaded.
OmegaT 在每次打开或重新载入项目时，也将翻译记忆备份到同一子目录下的 project_save.tmx.YEARMMDDHHNN.bak 文件中。
OmegaT also has the following mailing lists and trackers, which are hosted on Sourceforge:
OmegaT在Sourceforge上公布管理下面这些邮件名单和项目主页：
OmegaT automatically saves translations every 10 minutes as well as when you close the project or quit OmegaT.
OmegaT 每十分钟保存一次翻译，且在关闭项目或退出前自动保存。
OmegaT automatically selects a tokenizer for the source and the target language according to the language settings of the project.
OmegaT会根据项目语言设置中的源语言和目标语言自动选择相应的分词器。
OmegaT can align Java .properties in console mode.
OmegaT 可以在控制台模式中对齐 Java .properties。
OmegaT can also check for programming variables (printf-function variables) like '%s'.
OmegaT也可以检查程序变量（printf函数变量），如'％s'。
OmegaT can be customized to support other file formats as well.
还可以定制 OmegaT 来支持其它文件格式。
OmegaT can check that programming variables (like %s for instance) in the source exist in the translation.
OmegaT可以检查源文本中的程序变量如（%s）在译文中是否存在。
OmegaT can generate and store a master password so you don't have to enter it each time, but this is much less secure.
OmegaT可以生成并存储主密码，因此你不需要每次都键入密码，但这样安全性会大大降低。
OmegaT displays a list of all segments containing all of the words specified.
OmegaT 会显示所有词汇都出现了的片段清单。
OmegaT encrypts sensitive passwords and API keys with a master password.
OmegaT用主密码将密码和API密钥加密。
OmegaT exports version 1.4 TMX files (both level 1 and level 2).
OmegaT 导出 1.4 版本的 TMX 文件（包括级别 1 和级别 2）。
OmegaT features highly customizable filters, enabling you to configure numerous aspects.
OmegaT 的特色之一是可高度自定义过滤器，您可以配置众多的过滤器。
OmegaT follows very strict procedures when loading translation memory (tmx) files.
OmegaT在加载翻译记忆文件（TMX 文件）时遵循非常严格的过程。
OmegaT has a built-in spell checker based on the spelling checker used in Apache OpenOffice, LibreOffice, Firefox and Thunderbird.
OmegaT内置有拼写检查器，它基于在Apache OpenOffice、LibreOffice、Firefox和Thunderbird中使用的拼写检查器。
OmegaT has a very active, supportive and multilingual user group <a0>here</a0>, which users are strongly encouraged to join.
OmegaT拥有非常活跃，热情的多语言用户组<a0>这里</a0>, 强烈鼓励用户加入
OmegaT has an inline spelling checker.
OmegaT拥有内联拼写检查工具
OmegaT 已自动选择“是”选项。
OmegaT has detected a 3.6-style team project.
OmegaT已检测出3.6风格的团队项目。
OmegaT identifies the source file encoding by using its encoding declaration, if present (HTML files, XML based files)
OmegaT 通过（HTML 文件、基于 XML 的文件中）可能存在的编码声明来识别源文件编码。
OmegaT in the command line mode
以命令行模式运行 OmegaT
OmegaT inserts the translation of the string most similar to the current source, if it is above the similarity threshold that you have selected in this dialog.
OmegaT 将插入与当前源文本最相似译文字符串，前提是相似度高于在此对话框中设置的阈值。
OmegaT interfaces to SVN and Git, two common team software versioning and revision control systems (RCS), available under an open source license.
OmegaT为SVN和Git提供了界面，它们是在开源许可下提供的版本控制系统的两种常用协作软件。
OmegaT is a computer-assisted translation (CAT) tool.
OmegaT 是一种计算机辅助翻译（CAT）工具。

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.
OmegaT 是一种免费开源的跨平台计算机辅助翻译工具软件，包含模糊匹配、翻译记忆、关键词搜索、术语表和协作翻译等功能

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.
OmegaT 是一种免费开源的多平台计算机辅助翻译工具软件，它将模糊匹配、译法记忆、关键词搜索、术语表和译法杠杆等融合成了最新项目。
OmegaT is able to recognize that you have done this.
OmegaT 可以识别出您已经翻译过了。
OmegaT is able to store translations that are identical to the source.
OmegaT 会保存等同于原文的译文。
OmegaT is an open-source application and project.
OmegaT是一款开源的应用和项目。
OmegaT is available under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
该程序是免费软件，遵循 FSF 的 GNU General Public License v3或者更高版本，你可以对它进行编辑或者重新发布。
OmegaT is instructed to use a mandatory encoding for certain file formats (Java properties etc)
OmegaT 被设置为某些文件格式（Java 属性等）使用强制性编码。
OmegaT is not yet able to detect mistakes in formatting fully automatically, so it will not prompt you if you make an error or change formatting to fit your target language better.
OmegaT 目前还无法自动检测格式错误，因此如果犯了错误或者改变格式以更好适应您使用的目标语言时，它不会对您作任何提示。
OmegaT is refused access to the system property containing the name of your OS and/or the system property containing your home folder.
OmegaT 被拒绝访问包含操作系统名称和包含主文件夹的系统属性。
OmegaT is supplied as a package that can be downloaded from SourceForge.
OmegaT 是以可以从 SourceForge 下载的安装包的形式提供的。
OmegaT is supplied with a comprehensive user manual.
OmegaT 提供了一份全面详细的用户手册。
OmegaT is the original work of Keith Godfrey.
OmegaT 最初的工作由 Keith Godfrey 完成。
OmegaT is then ready to be launched.
OmegaT isn't just a product; it's an exciting project, and you can be part of it.
OmegaT不仅是一款产品；更是一个你可以参与其中的，令人激动的项目。
OmegaT leaves the editing field blank.
OmegaT main window contains the main menu, status bar and several panes.
OmegaT主窗口包括主菜单、状态栏和几个窗格。
包含数字、标签的OmegaT匹配度
OmegaT packages which include the Java Runtime Environment are now available to save users the trouble of selecting, obtaining and installing it.
目前，封装了 Java 运行环境的 OmegaT 安装包可省去用户选择、获取和安装它的麻烦。
OmegaT ran out of memory, and will quit when you press OK.
OmegaT 耗尽内存，将会在点击确定后退出。
OmegaT recognizes the language codes using the following two standard conventions :
OmegaT 使用下面两个标准约定来识别语言代码：
OmegaT requires the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) version 1.8 or higher to be installed on your system.
OmegaT需要您的系统安装了Java运行环境（JRE）1.8或者更高的版本。
OmegaT stores your translations and proposes possible translations from similar segments in registered in the translation memory files.
OmegaT 保存译文，并根据译法记忆文件中已有的相似片段给出可能的译文，以供参考。
OmegaT supports imported tmx versions 1.1-1.4b (both level 1 and level 2).
OmegaT 支持导入 tmx 的 1.1-1.4b 版本（包括级别 1 和级别 2）。
OmegaT supports the following file formats out of the box:
OmegaT 直接支持下列文件格式：
OmegaT supports two of the popular version control systems (VCS for short), <u0>Apache Subversion</u0> (often abbreviated SVN, after the command name svn) and <u1>Git</u1>.
OmegaT支持两种流行的版本控制系统（简写为VCS）：<u0>Apache Subversion</u0>（在命令名称svn后常被简称为SVN）和<u1>Git</u1>。
OmegaT thus takes the TUV segments corresponding to the project's source and target language codes and uses them as the source and target segments respectively.
因此OmegaT抓取符合项目的源和目标语言代码的tuv片段，并把它们分别作为源和目标片段使用。
OmegaT uses a number of librairies.
OmegaT uses glossaries containing translations of single words or small phrases: a simplified bilingual dictionary for a specific domain.
OmegaT 的术语表包含单词或短语的翻译，即，术语表就是特定领域中的简易双语词典。
OmegaT uses the default encoding of the operating system for text files.
OmegaT 为文本文件使用缺省的系统编码。

OmegaT uses the standard tmx file format to store and access translation memories, which guarantees that you can exchange your translation material with other CAT applications supporting this file format.
OmegaT 使用标准 TMX 文件格式存储和访问译法记忆，保证您同其他支持 TMX 文件格式的 CAT 工具进行译法记忆交互。
OmegaT uses translation memories to store your previous translations and then suggest likely translations for the text you are currently working on.
OmegaT 使用译法记忆文件存储完成的翻译，然后根据您当前翻译的文本，给您提供相似的译文作为参考。
OmegaT 版本{0}, 第{1}次更新
OmegaT videos on the Qabiria YouTube channel.
OmegaT 视频在 Qabiria YouTube 频道。

OmegaT will automatically parse even the most complex source folder hierarchies, to access all the supported files, and produce a target folder with exactly the same structure, including copies of any non-supported files.
即便是遭遇结构极其复杂的原文目录，OmegaT 也可以自动分析，访问所有支持的文件，制作一个结构完全相同且包含所有未支持文件的译文目录。
OmegaT will not launch if tokenizers are found in the /plugin folder.
如果在/plugin文件夹找到分词器则OmegaT将不会运行它。
OmegaT will present one segment at a time for you to translate.
OmegaT每次呈现一个片段供您翻译。
OmegaT will recognize it is a team project, and will synchronize everything automatically, every three minutes by default.
OmegaT会识别出团队项目，并在缺省的情况下每隔三分钟自动同步所有内容。
OmegaT will run on the open-implementation source Java packaged with many Linux distributions (for example, Ubuntu), but you may experience bugs, display problems or missing features.
OmegaT 也行可以在很多 Linux 发行版本（如Ubutntu）所附带的开源 Java 包之上运行，但可能会遇到 Bug、显示问题或者功能缺失。
OmegaT will then copy the selected files to the <f2>/source/</f2> subfolder of your newly created project.
OmegaT跟着会复制选择的文件到新建项目的<f2>/source/</f2>子文件夹。
OmegaT will then omit the appropriate files while loading projects, and will copy them unmodified when creating target documents.
这样一来，在载入项目时 OmegaT 会忽略这些文件，并且在创建目标文档时对它们进行原封不动的复制。
OmegaT will then report these segments as not translated.
OmegaT 将这些片段报告为未译。
OmegaT will try to resegment the TMX file...
OmegaT 将尝试对TMX文件重新分段。
OmegaT's developers, who are all volunteers, may be more willing to implement an RFE if the development work is funded by the requester.
OmegaT的开发人员都是志愿者，如果请求者提供资金，他们可能更愿意实施RFE。
OmegaT's one-to-many matching function first assumes that identical segments are to be translated in the same way.
OmegaT的一对多匹配功能首先默认相同片段应以同样方式翻译。

Other formatted text file types may also be handled by OmegaT by associating their file extensions to a supported file type, assuming that the corresponding segmentation rules will segment them correctly.
其它的格式化文本文件可以通过将其文件扩展名关联到所支持的文件类型（假设相应的分割规则可以正确分割它们）来让 OmegaT 进行处理。
Other operating systems (Linux, OS X) offer similar packages.
其他操作系统（Linux、OS X）提供了类似的软件。

Other plain text file types can be handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0> by associating their file extension to a supported file type (for example, .pod files can be associated to the ASCII text filter) and by pre-processing them with specific segmentation rules.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 可以处理的其它的纯文本文件可以通过将其文件扩展名关联到所支持的文件类型（比方说，.pod 文件可以关联到 ASCII 文本过滤器）并使用特定的分割 规则来进行预处理。
Other plain text or formatted text file formats suitable for processing in OmegaT may also exist.
还存在适合 OmegaT 处理的其他纯文本或格式化文本文件。
Other translations, identified specifically in the TMX, can be displayed using different colours.
其它在TMX中独有的翻译会以不同的颜色显示。

推荐其他用户使用 <a0>Okapi Filters Plugin</a0> 。
Otherwise, OmegaT will use the language of the operating system.
否则，OmegaT 将会使用操作系统的语言。
Overlapping is the result of bad manipulations of tag pairs and is guaranteed to result in formatting corruption and sometimes in the translated file not opening at all.
对标签对的错误维护将会导致重叠，也肯定会导致格式破坏以及某些情况下根本无法打开已译文件。

Paired tags usually indicate style information that applies to the text between the opening tag and the closing tag of a pair.
成对标签通常指对开标签和闭标签之间的文本使用格式信息的标签对。

Paragraph segmentation is advantageous in certain cases, such as highly creative or stylistic translations in which the translator may wish to change the order of entire sentences; for the majority of projects, however, sentence segmentation is a choice to be preferred, since it delivers better matches from previous translations.
在某些情况中使用段落分割是有好处的，例如在与创造性和文学性高度相关的翻译中，译员可能需要改变整个段落的顺序；然而，对于大多数项目，应优先选择句子分割，因为这样可以与以前的翻译实现更好的匹配。
Paragraph segmentation is less frequently used, but can be useful in cases of so-called "creative" texts.
根据段落分割片段使用较少，但处理“创意类”文本时可提高翻译效率。
Paragraph segmentation on line breaks, empty lines or never:

Since version 2.0.1, OmegaT has had a text export function.
自2.0.1版本开始，OmegaT加入了文本导出功能。
Single tags indicate formatting information that does not affect the surrounding text (an extra space or line break for example).
单个标签指的是对周边文本没有影响的格式化信息（例如：额外的空格或者行终止）。

略过包含一系列特定字符的片段。

而接下来的两个匹配和第4个匹配是类似的，但不同。

因此直接输入术语而不通过术语表及其快捷方式可能会更快。

一些附带脚本可以写这里找到： <u0>OmegaT Scripts</u0>
Some of the dictionaries have no strings attached - i.e. are "Free to use", and others, like the selection above, are under the GPL license.
一些词典有些不附带任何条件——也就是说可以“自由使用”，而另一些，如上述则是基于GPL许可。
Some of the file formats, specialized for translation work, for instance PO, allow the inclusion of comments.
某些专门用于翻译工作的文件格式（例如PO）允许包含注释。
Some project folders seem to have been moved.
某些项目目录好像被移走了。
某些快捷键还包含其他按键。
Some tag manipulations are necessary and are benign, others will cause problems when the translated document is created.
某些标签操作是必要的和良性的，但有些在创建已译文档时会导致问题。
Some tag scenarios flagged in the tag validation window are necessary and are benign, others will cause problems when the translated document is created.
在标签验证窗口中包含的某些情况的标签是必要的和良性的，但有些在创建已译文档时会导致问题。
Some tools are known to produce invalid tmx files under certain conditions.
已知有些工具在某些情况下会产生非法的TMX文件。
Some types of source files (for instance PO, TTX, etc.) are bilingual, i.e. they serve both as a source and as a translation memory.
某些类型的源文件（例如PO、TTX等）是双语文件，即它们即作为源文件又作为翻译记忆。
Something went wrong, please visit Tilde Terminology for details.
有错误发生，请访问Tilde Terminology获得具体信息。
Sometimes you may wish to rename the files you translate automatically, for example adding a language code after the file name.
有时您也需希望系统自动将译好的的文件重新命名，比如在文件名后加上语言代码。
Sometimes, however, your translated file may look strange, and – in the worst case – may even refuse to open.
然而有时，这些错误会导致译出的文件看起来不正常，在最坏的情况中甚至可能无法打开。
Sometimes, it is useful to distinguish between high-quality translation memories and those that are, because of the subject matter, client, revision status, etc., less reliable.
有时由于题材、客户、版本状态等，需要从翻译记忆中区分出高质量译文与不可靠译文。

Such file formats are designed to hold formatting information.
这些文件格式是设计用来保持格式信息的。
Such files can be created in any of the three varieties indicated above.
这样的文件可创建为上面提示的三种形式。
Such files do not contain any formatting information beyond the "white space" used to align text, indicate paragraphs or insert page breaks.
这样的文本除了用于对齐文本、标示段落或插入页面的“空白”之外没有任何格式化信息。
Such files may also be written out in any encoding.
这些文件也可以任何编码方式输出。

举例来说，这样的修改对ODF文件是可行的。
Summary of propagation and one-to-many matching commands
传输摘要与一对多匹配指令
TBX - Term Base eXchange - is the open, XML-based standard for exchanging structured terminological data, TBX has been approved as an international standard by LISA and ISO.
TBX（Term Base eXchange）是用于交换结构化术语数据的基于 XML 的开放标准，已经被LISA和ISO批准为国际标准。
TMX file was created by OmegaT 1.4.x or earlier.
TMX files are read sorted by their names and segments within a given TMX file line by line.
在指定的TMX文件中是根据每行的名称和片段逐行读取TMX文件的。
TMX files can generally contain translation units with several candidate languages.
TMX文件通常包含有多种候选语言的翻译单元。
TMX files of localizations of the OmegaT documentation and of this site, for use by localizers.
为期望对OmegaT文档及网站进行本地化的爱好者提供的TMX文件。
Tag errors are cases in which the tags in the translation do not correspond in order and number to the original segment.
标签错误是指译文中标签的顺序和数目与源片段不一致。
Tag errors are tag sequences in the translation in which the same tag order and number as in the original segment is not reproduced.
标签错误指的是译文中的标签序列没有完全按照源片段中的标签顺序和数量复制。
Tags are always either singles or paired.
标签不是单个的就是成对的。
Tags are highlighted in bold blue for easy comparison between the original and the translated contents.
标签用加粗蓝色突出显示，以便于对源内容和译后内容进行比较。
Tags are numbered incrementally by tag group.
标签以标签组自增长方式进行编号。
Tags generally represent formatting in some form of the original text.
标签通常代表了原始文本中的某种格式。
Tags generally represent some kind of formatting in the original text.
标签通常代表了原始文本中的某种格式。
Tags reproduced in the translated segment will be present in the translated document.
在已译片段中重新创建的标签将会出现在译后文档中。

在项目进行过程中，对<l0>/source</l0>目录中的文件进行修改要特别小心。

Tcl/tk作为一种脚本语言，具有很多优势：

Text Replace: The scope of a text replacement is the target segments of the project, whether they already have contents or not.

Text in source segment that matches is shown in italic.

Thanks to the work of translators in the past, OmegaT's user interface and/or Help texts have been translated into several languages.
感谢以前译者的工作，OmegaT的用户界面和帮助文档 已经被翻译成多种语言。
That means that if you feel so inclined, you may modify OmegaT to suit your own requirements.
这意味着如果你想，就可以修改OmegaT满足自己的需求。
That means that users like you are free to download and use it with very little in the way of restrictions.
这意味着，像你一样的用户，可以免费下载，几乎无限制地使用。
That means there are only a few thousand left!
这意味着只剩下几千种了!
The current folder will be used instead.
将使用当前文件夹来替代。
The "Cmd" key either has a "command" label or an apple symbol on Apple keyboards.
"Cmd" 键就是在苹果键盘上印有 "command" 或“苹果”符号的那个键。

The "Shift" key doesn't exhibit any special behavior per se: when the "Shift" key is pressed, all keys move the cursor in their usual manner, except in the case of the <l0>Shift+Enter</l0> combination, that inserts a line break into the text.
“Shift”键不会表现出特殊的行为：在按下 "Shift" 时使用上面快捷键也会以相同的方式移动，唯一的例外是<l0>Shift+Enter</l0>组合键会在文本中插入新行符。
The "old" version of OmegaT will be overwritten, but any settings from it will be retained.
旧版本的 OmegaT 会被覆盖，不过将保留所有的设置。
The '*' character matches zero or more characters (the search term 'run*' would match 'run', 'runs', and 'running', for example).
字符 '*'匹配0个或多个字符串（例如：搜索条件 'run*' 将会匹配 'run'、 'runs'和 'running'）。
The '?' character matches exactly one character ('run?' would match 'runs' and 'rung', for example, but not 'run' or 'running').
字符 '?' 匹配任何单个的字符串（例如'run?' 将会匹配'runs' 和 'rung'，但是不匹配 'run' 或 'running'）。
The '?' character matches exactly one character.
The /tm/ folder can contain any number of ancillary translation memories - i.e. tmx files.
/tm/ 可包含任何数量的辅助翻译记忆，即 TMX 文件。
The 3 other options are described in the specific page concerning <l0>TaaS</l0> (Terminology as a Service).
其它三种选项在关于<l0>TaaS</l0> （术语即服务）的特定页面中显示。
The <a0>OmegaT</a0> file includes <a1>OmegaT</a1> specific formatting tags so that the file can be used in other <a2>OmegaT</a2> projects
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 文件包含了 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 特殊的格式标签，因此该文件可用于其他 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 项目。
The <a0>OmegaT</a0> user is not forced to use Google Translate.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 并不强迫用户使用谷歌翻译。
The <e0>"-Duser.language=XX"</e0> argument causes <a1>OmegaT</a1> to use the language specified rather than the language of the user's operating system.
<e0>"-Duser.language=XX"</e0> 参数会使得 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 使用指定的语言而不是用户操作系统的语言。
The <e0>Replace Glossary Hits when Inserting Source Text</e0> option allows to replace automatically glossary hits with the target term when source text is inserted.
<e0>在插入原文时替换匹配词汇表中的术语</e0> 选项，在插入原文时自动替换术语表中匹配的术语。
The <e0>omegat</e0> subfolder contains at least one and possibly several other files.
<e0>omegat</e0>子目录至少包含一个或多个其他文件。
The <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> located in the omegat folder of your project contains more detailed segment information, broken down by file.
项目 omegat 文件夹中的 <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> 提供了每份文件更多的片段细节信息。
The <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> file contains all the segments that have been recorded in memory since you started the project.
<f1>project_save.tmx</f1> 文件包含了自项目开始以来所有被保存的片段。
The <f2>project_save.tmx</f2> files are then collected and possible conflicts as regards terminology for instance get resolved.
然后收集 <f2>project_save.tmx</f2>，并解决可能存在的用词冲突。
The <f3>level1</f3> and <f4>level2</f4> memories can be shared with users of other translation programs.
<f3>level1</f3>和<f4>level2</f4>翻译记忆可以共享给使用其他翻译工具的用户。

The <g0>Display Context Description for TBX Glossaries</g0> option allows to show or hide contextual information with the terms (that come from TBX glossaries located in <f1>glossary</f1> folder) in the Glossary pane.
<g0>展示TBX术语表文本描述</g0> 选项可在术语表窗口展示或隐藏术语文本信息（来自位于TBX术语表中的<f1>glossary</f1> 文件夹）。
The <m0> <s1> <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>E</k4> </k2> </s1> <g5>Project</g5> <g6>Properties...</g6> </m0> dialog is used to define and modify the project folders and languages.
<m0> <s1> <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>E</k4> </k2> </s1> <g5>项目</g5> <g6>属性...</g6> </m0>对话框可用来修改项目文件夹和语种。

以十六进制值 0xhhhh 表示的字符
The character with octal value 0mnn (0 <= m <= 3, 0 <= n <= 7)
八进制值 0mnn (0 <= m <= 3, 0 <= n <= 7) 表示的字符
The character with octal value 0n (0 <= n <= 7)
八进制值 0n (0 <= n <= 7) 表示的字符
The character with octal value 0nn (0 <= n <= 7)

字符 x，除了以下内容...

对话框下半部分的复选框实现了下列目的：

The collaborative translation offered by OmegaT is based on the functionality of version or revision control, widely used by the software community to maintain control of changes to the code of a program and allow unimpeded collaboration within the development team.
OmegaT中的协作翻译基于版本控制功能，该功能广泛应用于软件社区的程序代码维护和开发团队内部的无阻碍协作。
The colours are displayed as long as the "Save auto-populated status" (in Options/Editing behaviour..) option is checked.
只要“保存自动填充状态”（在选项/编辑操作中）选项，背景颜色将会一直存在。
The command must include "{target}", which will be replaced with the search text.
命令必须包含 "{目标}"，它将会在搜索文本中被替换。

The computer, running OmegaT, has Russian as the default language, and thus shows the characters in the Cyrillic alphabet and not in Kanji.
运行 OmegaT 的电脑的缺省语言为俄语，因此它使用西里尔字符集而不是汉字字符集显示字符。
The configuration folder will be used instead.
将使用当前文件夹来替代。

The content of a segment can be deleted completely either by means of the keyboard shortcuts Ctrl+A > Ctrl+X > Enter, by right-clicking with the mouse and the Remove Translation menu item, or simply by using the delete key (repeatedly).
可以通过使用键盘快捷键Ctrl+A > Ctrl+X > Enter，或鼠标右击片段，选择移除翻译菜单选项，再或重复使用删除键，均可实现完全删除一条片段的内容
The content of the files is overwritten either when a new segment is opened (source.txt and target.txt) or when a new selection is exported (selection.txt).
打开新片段（source.txt 和 target.txt）或导出新的选中部分（selection.txt）时，会覆盖该文件的原有内容。
The content of the script window is editable and can be copied and pasted back into the OmegaT Editor pane.
脚本窗口中的内容是可编辑的，也可以复制粘贴回OmegaT编辑器窗格。
The content of the segment source text (<f0>source.txt</f0>).
The content of the segment target text (<f0>target.txt</f0>).
The contents can be customized using following variables:
可以下列变量定制该内容：
The contents of glossary files are kept in memory and are loaded when the project is opened or reloaded.
术语表文件的内容会存放到内存中，在打开或重新载入项目时加载它们。
The contents of the checkout folder will be marked accordingly:
检出文件夹的内容会进行相应的标记：
The contents of the glossary pane will be updated accordingly.
因此术语表窗格的内容将会被更新。
The contents of the target subfolder will reflect the current state of the translation, as present in the project translation memory, saved in the current <e8>/omegat/project_save.tmx</e8>.
target子文件夹的内容将反映当前的翻译状态，如同在当前<e8>/omegat/project_save.tmx</e8>中保存的项目翻译记忆一样。
The contents of translation memories in the tm subfolder serve to generate suggestions for the text(s) to be translated.
在 tm 子目录中翻译记忆的内容是为要翻译文本提供建议。
The control character corresponding to x
与 x 对应的控制字符
The counters in the lower right corner keep track of the progress of the translation (numbers in the left hand column refer to the figure above):
在右下角方框中的内容表示翻译工作的进度（左列的数字请参考上面的图示）：
The created target documents are located in the <f0>target</f0> folder.
创建的目标文档放置在<f0>目标</f0>文件夹中。
The current folder will be used instead.
将使用当前文件夹来替代。
The current project must be reloaded in order to apply these changes
要应用这些修改当前项目需要重新载入
The current version of the service is based on usage, with the price of 20 USD per million characters at the time of writing.
该服务的当前版本根据使用付费的，在编写此文档时每百万字符 20 USD 的价格。
The data are exported when the segment is opened.
打开一个片段时它的内容会被导出。
The default OmegaT shortcuts are available from Sourceforge: <u0>Default OmegaT Shortcuts</u0>
缺省的 OmegaT 快捷键设置可从 Sourceforge 获取：<u0>缺省的 OmegaT 快捷键</u0>
The default OmegaT shortcuts for the Mac are also available from Sourceforge, they all use "meta" instead of "ctrl": <u0>Default OmegaT Shortcuts for the Mac</u0>
在Mac系统中缺省的OmegaT快捷键同样可从Sourceforge获取，其中把所有的“ctrl”都被替换为“meta”：<u0>Mac 系统上缺省的OmegaT快捷键</u0>
The dialog allows to enable or disable the following options:
此对话允许或不允许以下选项：
The dialog box allows also to set external Post-processing commands (that are executed after <g0>Create Translated Documents</g0> command
对话框可以设定外部后期处理命令（会在点击 <g0>创建已译文档</g0> 命令后执行）。
The dialog can be accessed via the <i0/><m1> <g2>Options</g2> <g3>Font...</g3> </m1> item in the Main menu.
通过主菜单中的<i0/><m1> <g2>选项</g2> <g3>字体...</g3> </m1>菜单项可以调出该对话框。
The dialog in <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Editing Behavior...</g2> </m0> enables the user to select, how the current segment in the editing field is to be initialized and handled:
在<m0> <g1>选项</g1> <g2>编辑行为...</g2> </m0>打开的对话框中，用户可以选择如何初始化和处理编辑区域的当前片段：
The dialog is useful because it includes a special target filename pattern editor with which you can customize the names of output files.
该对话框非常有用，因为它带有的特定目标文件名模式的编辑器，它允许您自定义输出文件的名称。
The dialog to create a project is the same as to edit the project.
创建项目的对话框与编辑项目属性的相同。
The difference between "Number of segments" and "Number of unique segments" provides an approximate idea of the number of repetitions in the text.
通过“片段数”和“唯一片段数”的差异可粗略估算出文本中有多少重复内容。
The display mode of the translated documents must be modified within the application (such as Microsoft Word) commonly used to display or modify them (check the relevant manuals for details).
已译文档的显示模式必须在常用于显示或编辑它们的应用程序（例如 Microsoft Word）中进行修改（查阅相关手册了解详细信息）。
The displayed text is split into segments and you may scroll through the document and double-click on any segment to open and edit it.
显示的文本被分成片段，您可以在文档中上下移动或者双击某个片段进行编辑。
The documentation distributed with <a0>OmegaT</a0> includes the User Manual and the readme.txt document.
本文档与包含用户手册及readme.txt文档的 <a0>OmegaT</a0>同时发布。

The documents are opened by the application chosen by the operating system.
文档以操作系统选定的应用打开。
The encoding of glossaries is determined automatically.
术语表的编码是自动决定的。
The entry <e3>Remove translation</e3> in the same pop up menu also allows to delete the existing translation of the current segment.
在相同的弹出菜单中的<e3>移除译文</e3>还可以用来删除当前片段的已有译文。
The entry will be greyed, if there's just one translation available.
如果仅有一个可用译文，则该条目会显示为灰色。
The example scripts provided <a0>here</a0> all launch a window, but scripts that carry out functions in the background are quite conceivable.
所提供的样例脚本 <a0>这里</a0>都会运行一个窗口，但那些可以在背景中实现功能的脚本都十分好理解。
The exported contents are copied to the file <f1>selection.txt</f1> located in the User's preference files folder (see <x2/>).
导出的内容被复制到位于用户首选项文件文件夹（请参阅<x2/>）的 <f1>selection.txt</f1> 文件中。
The extension must be <f0>.txt</f0> or <f1>.utf8</f1> (if not, it will be added).
扩展名必须为<f0>.txt</f0> or <f1>.utf8</f1> （如果不是的话，加上扩展名）.
The figure above shows the default match display template.
上图显示了默认的匹配显示模板。
The file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> contains all the segments that have been translated since you started the project.
<f0>project_save.tmx</f0> 文件包含了自项目开始以来已翻译的所有片段。
The file can usually be extracted by double-clicking on the downloaded package.
通常可通过双击已下载的安装包来解压缩文件。
The file does not need to exist when setting it, it will be created (if necessary) when adding a glossary entry.
在设置时该文件可以不存在，在添加词条时会自动创建该文件（如果需要）。

The files appear in the /script subfolder in the OmegaT user files folder (for the location of the OmegaT user files folder on your operating system, see the User Manual (F1 from within OmegaT) > Files and directories > User files):
导出的文件会保存到OmegaT用户文件中的/script子文件夹中（OmegaT用户文件夹在你的操作系统中的存储位置，参见使用手册（在OmegaT软件中使用F1键）>文件和目录>用户文件）：
The files appear in the /script subfolder in the OmegaT user files folder, and include:
导出的内容会保存到OmegaT用户文件目录的/script子文件夹中的文件，包括：
The files are unformatted plain text files.
这些文件是无格式的纯文本文件。
The files are unformatted plain-text files.
导出的文件是没有格式的纯文本文件。
The files of this site, in a convenient package for those wishing to localize it.
为希望对本网站进行本地化的爱好者提供便捷的打包。
The first example below has 3 tag groups (a pair, a single, and then another pair), the second example has one group only (a pair).
下面的第一个例子中有3个标签组（一组成对的，一组单个，另一组成对的），第二个例子中只有一组（成对的）。
The first is the shortcut for <g0>Open Project</g0>, the second for <g1>Create Glossary Entry</g1>.

The first of these is the <a0>OmegaT user group</a0>.
The first segment and its contents will be classified as "no match", and the rest of them as a repetition of the first.
第一个片段及其内容将被归类到“无匹配”中，而剩余片段则被视为第一个的重复。
The folder contains 2 files: index.html and <e3><a4>OmegaT</a4>.app.</e3> Copy the folder to a suitable folder (e.g. Applications).
此文件夹中包含两个文件：index.html 和 <e3><a4>OmegaT</a4>.app.</e3> 将文件夹复制到合适的文件夹（如：Applications)。

下列教程可供在线查阅或下载
The following two steps will bring the server version up to date:
通过下面的两个步骤可以把最新的版本传到服务器：
The following window shows an example of a) the English source b) Spanish and c) Slovenian Google Translate translation.
下面的窗口展示了一个 a) 英文原文 b) 西班牙语 和 c) 斯洛文尼亚语 的谷歌翻译译文。
The formatting information can be as simple as “this is bold”, or as complex as table data with different font sizes, colors, positions, etc.
这些格式信息可能就像 “这是粗体”一样简单，也可能是包含了不同的字体大小、颜色和位置等信息的表格数据一样复杂。
The formatting represented by the group you have duplicated will be applied to both sections.
您复制的标签组所代表的格式将会应用到原标签和复制标签的两个部分。

The fuzzy matches can be also sorted in different ways (for displaying only; no influence on statistics).
模糊匹配可以按两种方式排序 （仅用于显示或不影响统计）。
The glossary file does not have the correct encoding.
术语表文件没有采用正确的编码。

术语表文件没有正确的拓展名 (.tab, .utf8 or .txt)。
The glossary function only finds exact matches with the glossary entry (e.g. does not find inflected forms etc.).
术语表功能只能找到与术语表条目精确匹配的词汇（也就是说不会找到变化的词形）。
The group archives are public and can be viewed without subscription to the group.
该讨论组的存档是公开的，无须订阅该讨论组就可进行查看。
The help browser (which displays this manual) can be opened by pressing <k0><i1/>F1</k0> or navigating to <g2><i3/>Help → User Manual...</g2> in the main menu.
帮助浏览器（显示本手册）可通过按 <k0><i1/>F1</k0> 或调用主菜单中的<g2><i3/>帮助→用户手册...</g2>条目来打开。
