The in-line formatting information made possible by the supported formats (in particular DocBook, HTML, XHTML, Open Document Format(ODF) and Office Open XML (MS Office 2007 and later) at the time of writing) is presented as tags in OmegaT.
在OmegaT中，由所支持格式（尤其是在写入DocBook、HTML、XHTML、开放文档格式（ODF）和 Office 开放 XML（MS Office 2007及更高版本）的时候）产生的内部格式化信息以标签的形式出现。
The information below summarizes their use and how they are invoked:
下面的信息概述了它们的用途和调用方式：
The install program can create shortcuts for you in the start menu, on the desktop and in the quick launch area.
* Windows用户： 安装程序可以在开始菜单、桌面和快速启动栏创建快捷方式。
The items are not separated with a TAB character.
词条的各项间未使用 TAB 字符分隔。
The language code should be in the form xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY or xxx_YY, where xx or xxx is the language code and YY is the region or country code (optional).
语种代码应该以 xx-YY 或 xx_YY的形式输入，其中 xx 是语言代码而 YY 是地区或国家代码（可选）。
The last frame offers you to have a look at the readme and changes files for the version you have installed.
最后一个画面提议您看看所安装版本的自述文件和更新文件。
The last segment with the identical source text will thus prevail (Note: of course it makes more sense to avoid this to happen in the first place).
因此含相同源文本的最后一个片段将获得采用（注：当然预先避免这种情况发生会更有意义）。
The level 2 export is not fully compliant with the level 2 standard, but is sufficiently close and will generate correct matches in other translation memory tools supporting TMX Level 2.
导出的级别 2 不是标准的级别 2，但是足以在支持 TMX 级别 2 的翻译工具中产生正确的匹配。
The level1 file contains only textual information.
level1 文件仅包含文本信息。

The level2 file encapsulates <a0>OmegaT</a0> specific tags in correct tmx tags so that the file can be used with its formatting information in a translation tool that supports tmx level 2 memories, or <a1>OmegaT</a1> itself.
level2 文件以适当的 TMX 标签封装了 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 的特殊标签，因此它可以在支持第 2 级 TMX 的翻译工具中使用其中的格式信息，包括 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 本身。
The license of each library is mentionned in /lib/licenses/Licenses.txt.
每个类库的许可证书在以下文本中都有提到：/lib/licenses/Licenses.txt。
The line with the matching percentage also includes the name of the translation memory <i1/> containing the match.
在显示匹配率的这一行还显示了包含该匹配的翻译记忆的名称<i1/>。
The location does not matter, since you can add it to the command line at launch (see below).
位置并不重要，因为无论如何，启动时您都必须将位置添加到命令行。
The location does not matter, since you can add it to the command line at startup.
位置并不重要，因为无论如何，启动时您都必须将位置添加到命令行。
The location does not matter, since you have to add it to the command line at the start-up anyway.
位置并不重要，因为无论如何启动时您都必须将位置添加到命令行。
The location is irrelevant, since it must be specified explicitly on the command-line at launch.
位置并不重要，因为无论如何，启动时您都必须在命令行中明确指定它的位置。
The location of the <f1>.tbx</f1> file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx</f3>).
<f1>.tbx</f1> 文件的地址必须在 <f2>/glossary</f2>文件夹中，但也能存在其子文件夹下，如 <f3>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx。</f3>).
The location of the file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).
文件必须保存在 <f2>/glossary</f2>文件夹中，但它可以保存在/glossary的子文件夹中，如, <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).
The location of the writable glossary file can be set in the <g0>Project > Properties ... </g0>dialog.
可写术语表的位置可在<g0>项目>属性...</g0>对话框中设定。
The location of user files depends upon the platform you use:
用户文件的位置取决于当前使用的平台：
The locations of the various different translation memories for a given project are user-defined (see Project dialog window in <l0>Project properties)</l0>
对于指定的项目，多种不同翻译记忆的位置是由用户定义的（请参阅<l0>项目属性</l0>中的项目对话框）。
The machine translation pane, when opened, contains the suggestions by machine translation tools for the current segment.
在机器翻译窗格中，打开后其中会包含由机器翻译工具为当前片段提供的翻译建议。
The main menu provides access to all <a0>OmegaT</a0> functions.
通过主菜单可访问 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 的所有功能。
The main project folder contains 3 tmx files, <f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>, <f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> and <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2> (project_name being the name of your project).
项目主文件夹中包含 3 个 tmx 文件：<f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>，<f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> 以及 <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2>（project_name 是项目的名称）。
The main window consists of several panes, the main menu and a status bar.
主窗口由几个窗格、主菜单和状态栏组成。
The match statistics are accessed via<g0>Tools>Match Statistics.</g0> The evaluation is rather CPU intensive and can be time-consuming, so a progress bar is shown during the calculation.
通过<g0>工具/匹配统计</g0>可访问统计信息。该统计需要CPU进行繁重的运算而耗时较多，所以在计算时会显示进度条。

The match viewer shows the most similar segments from translation memories, both from internal project translation memory created in real time as you translate your project and from ancillary translation memories you have imported from your earlier jobs, or received from your client or translation agency.
匹配查看器中显示译法记忆中最相似的片段，包括您在项目翻译过程中创建的项目翻译记忆，也包括从您早前工作中导入的辅助记忆，或者是您从客户或翻译代理那里得到得到的。
The matches will be displayed in bold blue.
匹配将显示为蓝色粗体。
The matching percentage is roughly equivalent to taking the number of common words in the matched and the matching segment and dividing by the number of words in the longer of the two.
匹配率大体上相当于匹配片段和被匹配片段中相同的单词数量，并除以两者单词数量中较大者。
The memory named <f5>omegat</f5> can be used by OmegaT itself, in future projects that you create.
名称为<f5>omegat</f5>的翻译记忆可被OmegaT自身用于将来创建的项目。
The messages you would usually find in the status bar are not displayed.

The most current info about OmegaT can be found at:
可从下列网址获取 OmegaT 的最新信息：

最常用的功能可以使用键盘快捷键访问，因此当您习惯了使用它们之后，在翻译的时候根本不需要使用菜单。
The most important file here is the <f1>project_save.tmx, </f1>that is the working translation memory for the project.
其中最重要的文件是<f1>project_save.tmx</f1>，它是项目的有效翻译记忆文件。
The most important is <l1><project-dir></l1>, and optionally<l2> --config-dir=<config-dir>.
最重要的是 <l1><project-dir></l1>，以及可选的 <l2> --config-dir=<config-dir>。
The most important of these is <l0><project-dir></l0>, and optionally <l1>--config-dir=<config-dir></l1>.
其中最重要的是<l0><project-dir></l0>，还可以加上<l1>--config-dir=<config-dir></l1>。
The most that OmegaT can do in such a case, is to assume that the text is written in the same language the computer itself uses.
在这种情况下，一般 OmegaT 会假设该文本写入时使用了当前计算机所使用相同语言。
The names of the files must correspond to the language code of your target language as defined in the project properties dialog (<g0>Project > Properties</g0>).
文件的名称必须与项目属性对话框（<g0>项目>属性</g0>）中定义的目标语言的代码一致。
The names of the files must correspond to the language code of your target language as defined in the project properties dialog (Project > Properties).
文件的名称必须与项目属性对话框（项目>属性）中定义的目标语言代码一致。
The new set of rules will be stored together with the project and will not interfere with the general set of segmentation rules.
新的规则集将和项目保存在一起，而不与通用分割规则集相冲突。
The next segment with a note attached to it, will open.
打开含笔记的下一个片段。
The number of unique segments, if needed, is provided in the standard statistics window, regardless of whether they have been translated or not.
在需要时，标准统计窗口中会显示唯一片段数，不论它们是否已经翻译。
The numbers must be exactly the same between the source and the target matches.
在源和目标匹配中的数字必须完全相同。
The obtained API key needs to be passed to OmegaT at startup through <c0>yandex.api.key</c0> command-line parameter.
获得的API密钥需启动时通过 <c0>yandex.api.key</c0> 命令行参数传入在OmegaT。
The omegat folder contains the <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> and possibly a number of backup TMX files.
omegat 文件夹包含 <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> 文件，以及一些备份的 TMX 文件。
The one and the same segment may, depending on the context, require different translations.
同样的片段在不同的语境中可能会使用不同的译文。
The online version of Google Translate allows the user to correct the suggestion and send the corrected segment in.
谷歌翻译的在线版本允许用户纠正翻译建议和发送正确的片段。
The only difference with matches from the <f2>project_save</f2> translation memory is that external TMs cannot give exact matches, only 100%.
与 <f2>project_save</f2> 翻译记忆的匹配的唯一区别是外部 TM 中的统计不会得到精确匹配，而只是 100%。
The open source LanguageTool can be used to correct common grammatical and stylistic mistakes.
开源语言工具可用于纠正常见的语法和风格错误。
The option allows OmegaT to override the specification in the PO file header and use the default for the selected target language.
此选项会让OmegaT覆盖PO文件头部的规范并在选择的目标语言中使用默认规范。
The password you entered did not match.

罚点适用于所有的三种匹配百分率：此时匹配度75、80、90将减低至45、50和60。
The perfect companion for those of us who don't need complexity but efficiency; glossaries, auto-complete and automatic translation makes my work in literary translation so much more efficient
提高效率的最佳选择；术语库，自动填写，自动翻译让我的翻译更加高效。

The permissions you give to this version (which may appear as "unrestricted access to the computer") are identical to the permissions you give to the local version, i.e., they allow access to the hard drive of the computer.
您赋予该版本的权限（可能会被认为是“对计算机的无限制访问”）和您给予本地版本的相同，也就是说它们被允许访问计算机硬盘。

The permissions you give to this version (which might be mentioned as an "unrestricted access to the computer") are identical to permissions you give to the local version, as installed by a procedure, described later: they allow an access to the hard drive of the computer.
您赋予该版本的许可可能会被认为是“对计算机的无限制访问”和您给予本地版本的一样的，如同后面提到的按步骤安装：它们被允许访问计算机硬盘。
The philosophy of the project is described <a0>here</a0>.
The platform-independent package can be used on any platform with a working Java 1.6 runtime environment, including the platforms for which a specific package also exists.
该平台独立安装包可在任何运行Java 1.6运行时环境的平台上使用，包括安装有特定包的平台。

可用的按键事件在来自 Oracle 的 Java 1.6 文档中列出：<u0>Java 1.6 按键事件说明</u0>
The predefined break rules should be sufficient for most European languages and Japanese.
对于绝大多数欧洲语言和日语来说，预定义的中断规则已经够用了。
The predominant way of segmenting the sources is the sentence-level segmenting, so this check box should in a normal case be left checked.
语句级分割是主要的分割方式，所以正常情况下应该选中该复选框。
The prefix (per default empty) can be used to tag translations, done via fuzzy matches.
此时可以使用前缀对通过模糊匹配的译文加上标记。

The principal members of the project are:
The procedure is termed an <a0>"RFE" (Request for Feature Enhancement) and is managed here</a0>.
这一程序被称为 <a0>"RFE" （增强需求）</a0>.
The procedure presented here relies on the free SVN server (limited to 2 users) offered by <u0>ProjectLocker</u0>.
这里所说的过程依赖于由<u0>ProjectLocker</u0>提供的免费的SVN服务器（限制2个用户）。
The process of segmenting can be pictured as follows: the cursor moves along the text, one character at a time.
片段分割过程可描绘如下：光标沿着文本移动，每次一个字符。
The program will see confirmation before closing down.
程序在关闭前必须得到确认。
The project and TMX source languages should of course be identical - NL in our example.
当然项目和TMX的源语言必须一致，此例中为NL。
The project folder {0} is missing and could not be created.
项目目录 {0} 丢失，且无法创建。
The project in the example is evidently finished, as all the unique segments have been translated.
在这个例子中显然项目已经完成了，因为已经翻译了所有的唯一片段。
The project setting allows one to enter a name for a writable glossary file (see beginning of this chapter).
你可以在项目设置时输入术语表文件的名字来创建可写入术语表（见本章开端）。.
The project will be loaded as a local project without team functionality.
该项目将作为没有团队功能的本地项目加载。
The purpose of the console (i.e. command line) mode is to permit the use <a0>of OmegaT</a0> as translation tool in a scripting environment.
控制台（即命令行）模式的目的是将 <a0>of OmegaT</a0> 用作脚本环境的翻译工具。
The purpose of the console mode is to use OmegaT as a translation tool in a scripting environment.
控制台模式的目的是将 OmegaT 用作脚本环境的翻译工具。
The quality of formatting of the translated file will depend on the quality of the round-trip conversion.
译后文档中格式信息的质量将取决于来回转换的质量。

The quality of the Google Translate translation depends on one side on the reservoir of target-language texts and the availability of their bilingual versions, on the other hand on the quality of the models built.
谷歌翻译的质量当然一方面取决于目标语言文本和双语版本的可用性，另一方面取决于所创建模型的质量。
可识别出的扩展名为<f1>TXT</f1>和<f2>UTF8</f2>
The regular expressions (or regex for short) used in searches and segmentation rules are those supported by Java.
在搜索和片段切分规则中使用的是 Java 支持的正则表达式(或简称为 regex)。

The relevant files <l2>filters.conf</l2> and <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> can be found in the user home folder (E.g. <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> under Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> under Linux)
相关的文件<l2>filters.conf</l2>和<l3>segmentation.conf</l3>可在用户主目录找到（如Windows 系统中的<l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4>或Linux系统中的<l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6>）

The relevant files are <l2>filters.conf</l2> and <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> and can be found in the user home folder (e.g. <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> under Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> under Linux)
相关的文件是可在用户主目录找到的<l2>filters.conf</l2>和<l3>segmentation.conf</l3>（如：Windows系统中的<l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4>或Linux系统中的<l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6>）
The repository is empty at this moment.
The rest of the categories (50-100%) involves untranslated segments with a fuzzy match.
分类中的其他部分 (50-100%) 包含了具有模糊匹配的未译片段。
The result will thus depend on the order in which the source segments have been loaded.
因此结果取决于其中源片段被加载的顺序。

生成的 TMX 保存在 <f1>/omegat/</f1> 目录，名称为 <f2>align.tmx</f2>。
The resulting tmx is stored in the <l1>omegat </l1>folder under the name <f2>align.tmx</f2>.

生成的 TMX 保存在 <l1>omegat</l1> 目录，名称为 <f2>align.tmx</f2>。
The results from the priority glossary (by default, glossary/glossary.txt) appear in first places in the Glossary pane and in TransTips.
优先术语表 (默认的glossary/glossary.txt) 结果会在术语窗口和翻译建议中中优先出现。
The rule-based segmentation is usually synonymous with sentence-based segmentation.
基于规则的片段分割通常就是指根据句子进行片段分割。
The rules applied (if any) will depend on the source and target language of the project.
适用的规则（如果有的话）取决于项目的源语言和目标语言。
The rules for that set will appear in the bottom half of the window.
规则集合将出现在窗口的下半部分。
The same dialog is used to add a pattern or to edit a particular pattern.
新增模式和编辑特定模式使用的是相同的对话框。
The same spirit can be found within the OmegaT project.
在OmegaT项目中可以发现相同的精神。
The search string - [a-zA-Z]+[öäüqwß] - in the example above for instance looks for words in the target segment, containing questionable characters from German keyboard.
例如在上文示例中的搜索字符串[a-zA-Z]+[öäüqwß]在目标片段中寻找包含疑似来自德语键盘的字符的单词。
The search string will be treated as a regular expression.
搜索字符串将会被当作正则表达式进行处理。
The search term <l0>'run*'</l0> for example would match words <l1>'run'</l1>, <l2>'runs'</l2> and <l3>'running'</l3>.
例如搜索条件<l0>‘run*’</l0>将会匹配单词<l1>‘run’</l1>、<l2>‘runs’</l2>和<l3>‘running’</l3>。
The search window consists of a text field for search strings or keywords, flags and radio buttons for setting up the search and a display area containing the results of the search.
搜索窗口由三个部分组成：用于输入搜索字符串或关键字的文本框、用于设置搜索的标志和单选按钮、包含搜索结果的显示区域。
第二个参数 <l2>--pseudotranslatetype</l2> 是可选的。
The second command is the command which actually launches <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
第二条是实际启动 <a1>OmegaT</a1> 的命令。
The second of these chapters describes the various subfolders and files in a translation project and their role as well as other user and application files associated with OmegaT.
OmegaT 文件和目录章节介绍了翻译项目中不同的子目录和文件，阐述了这些子目录和文件的作用，以及其他 OmegaT 相关的用户和应用文件。
The segment is opened when either its segment call-out or segment number is entered.
在调出片段或输入片段数后，片段打开
The segmentation rules are generally valid across all the projects.
分割规则通常应用于所有项目。
The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
分割规则设置只影响 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 处理源文件的方式。
The segments are displayed in order of appearance in the project.
片段以在项目中出现的顺序显示。
The selected fuzzy match is highlighted in bold, words that are missing in the segment you are translating are colored blue and words adjacent to the missing parts green.
被选中的模糊匹配会以粗体突出显示，对正在翻译片段中缺少的单词显示为蓝色，而在缺少单词旁边的单词显示为绿色。
The selected languages will then be installed and will eventually appear in your spell checker setup window (this may take a while).
随后选中的语言将会被安装，并出现在拼写检查器窗口中（可能需要一段时间）。
The separators between the panes can be dragged to resize panes.
窗格之间的分割线可以拖动来改变窗格的尺寸。
The server can exist in the local network but in the majority of cases it will be available on internet, i.e. via URL address.
服务器可以在本地网络，但大部分情况下它在因特网上，即通过网址访问。
The server keeps the information on checkouts, so that later commits (see below) can be performed in an orderly fashion.
服务器维护了检出的信息，所以以后的提交（参阅下面）可以平滑地进行。
The server makes sure that any conflicting changes, due to two members working on the same checked-out contents, will be resolved.
服务器会确保在两个成员工作于相同的检出内容时引起的冲突得到解决。
The set of <e0>Unique </e0>segments is computed by taking all the segments and removing all duplicate segments.
<e0>唯一</e0>片段数目的计算方法为统计所有的片段并去除所有重复片段。
The settings in your project indicate which is the source and which the target language.
项目的设置将指出哪个是源语言，哪个是目标语言。
The shortcut characters used try to reflect the underlying meaning of the tag (e.g. b for bold, i for italics, etc.)
使用的快捷字符尝试反映标签所代表的格式含义（例如 b 表示粗体，i 表示斜体）。
The shortcut definition file must be named <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> and must contain at most one shortcut definition per line.
快捷键定义文件名称必须为 <f0>主菜单截图..properties</f0>，同时每行最多包含一个快捷键的定义。

The shortcut definition syntax is the following: <c0><menu item code>=<shortcut></c0>, where <e1><menu item code></e1> is a code taken from the tables below and <e2><shortcut></e2> is a combination of pressed keys specified by the user
快捷键定义的语法如下：<c0><menu item code>=<shortcut></c0>，其中<e1><menu item code></e1>取自下表，而<e2><shortcut></e2>是用户指定的按键组合
The shortcut selects the Nth match displayed in the match window (the first match is selected by default)
选中匹配窗口中显示的第 N 个匹配内容（缺省情况下选中第一个匹配）
The simplest way to launch OmegaT, however, is to execute the<e0> <a1>OmegaT</a1>.exe</e0> program.
然而，最简单的方法是运行 <e0> <a1>OmegaT</a1>.exe</e0> 程序。
The source file language entered is invalid!
输入的源文件语种无效！

源片段和模糊匹配中必须包含相同的数字列

The source subfolder contains files to be translated.
source子文件夹包含待译文件。

源术语可以不是一个单词，例如：

指定的项目是OmegaT 3.6风格的团队项目。

不支持指定的翻译方向

The spell checker uses the target language code to determine the language to be used : if the target language is Brazilian Portuguese (PT_BR), the subfolder with vocabularies must contain the two vocabulary files, called <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.
拼写检查器根据目标语言代码来决定要使用的语言：如果目标语言是巴西葡萄牙语 (PT_BR)，存放术语表的目录必须包括两份术语表，名为 <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> 和 <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>。
The statistics shown is available as a tab-separated <f1>project_stats.txt</f1> file (subfolder <f2>omegat</f2>), ready to be loaded into a spreadsheet program for the user's convenience.
这里显示的统计信息是tab分隔的<f1>project_stats.txt</f1>文件（在<f2>omegat</f2>子文件夹），方便用户加载到电子表格程序。
The statistics window - accessed via <e0>Tools>Statistics </e0>- shows the statistics of the current OmegaT project, both in the summary form as well as in detail for every file to be translated.
统计窗口（通过<e0>工具>统计</e0>打开）显示了OmegaT当前项目的统计信息，包括整个项目的总的统计信息和其中每个待译文件的详细情况。
The status bar displays work-flow related messages at the bottom of the main window.
在主窗口底部的状态栏显示和工作流相关的信息。
The syntax of the language pattern conforms to regular expression syntax.
语言模式的语法遵循正则表达式的语法规则。
The system maintains versioning for data shared
由系统维护共享数据的版本
The tag validation window detects and lists any tag errors and inconsistencies in the translation.
标签检验窗口检测译文中出现的所有标签错误和不一致并列出来。
The tags are displayed in a different font in order to make them less intrusive.
标签以一种不同的字体显示，旨在减少干扰性。
The tags are highlighted in bold blue for easy comparison between the original and the translated contents.
标签用加粗蓝色突出显示，以便于对源内容和译后内容进行比较。
The tags consist of one to three characters and a number.
标签由一到三个字符和一个数字组成。
The tags in OmegaT are greyed, so they are easy to recognise.
OmegaT中的标记为灰色，因此很容易识别。
The target filename pattern uses a special syntax, so if you wish to edit this field, you must click <e0>Edit...</e0>and use the <i1/>Edit Pattern Dialog.
目标文件名模式使用特殊的语法规则，因此如果希望编辑这些字段的话，您必须点击<e0>编辑...</e0>以使用<i1/>编辑模式对话框。
The target text entered after that will be treated as an alternative translation of the source segment.
之后输入的目标文本会被视为当前源片段的可选译文。
The team can also use the same subfolder structure for the target files.
该团队还可以使用相同的子目录结构来保存目标文件。
The term "Move to inside segment" means, that the cursor moves to the beginning of the segment if it was previously before the segment, and to the end of the segment if it was previously after it.
在这里“移动到片段内”是指，如果光标原来在此片段前面则移动到片段的开始处，如果在片段后面则移动到片段的末尾。

The text export function exports data from within the current OmegaT project to plain-text files.
文本导出功能会把当前OmegaT项目的内容导出为纯文本文件。
The text highlighted by the user, when <k0>Ctrl+Shift+C</k0> is pressed or <g1>Edit > Export Selection</g1> is selected (<f2>selection.txt</f2>).
在用户按下了 <k0>Ctrl+Shift+C</k0> 或选择了<g1>编辑 >导出选中部分</g1>的时候选择的文本（<f2>selection.txt</f2>）。
The text is exported to a plain text file.
该文本被导出到纯文本文件。

The third column can be used for additional information.
第三列用来保存附加信息。
The tmx file can be given any name you specify.

Tokenizers (or stemmers) improve the quality of matches by recognizing inflected words in source and translation memory data.
分词器（或 stemmer，词干分析器）通过识别源语言和翻译记忆数据中的词形变化来提高翻译匹配质量。
Tokenizers are included in OmegaT and active by default.
OmegaT里包含了分词器并且默认为开启状态。
Top folder of a project always contains the file<f0> OmegaT.Project</f0>, containing project parameters as defined in the Project properties window (<g1>Project > Properties</g1>).

选择该选项后，语言检查工具会对译文检查，并用蓝色显示出可能存在的问题。
When started in console mode, no GUI is loaded (so it will work on any console) and the given project is automatically processed as requested.
在控制台模式下，将不会载入任何图形化界面（因此仅在某控制台中运行），同时会自动按要求翻译指定的项目。
When starting OmegaT from the command line, specify in the command:
通过命令行打开OmegaT，输入命令：
When the translated document is created, its display direction will be the same as that of the original document.
在创建已译文档时，其显示方向将与源文本相同。
When the user exits <a0>OmegaT</a0>, this file is not emptied, in order to be consistent with usual clipboard behavior.
当用户退出 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 时，为了与通常的剪贴板行为一致，该文件不会清空。
When this file is executed, the commands within it are automatically carried out.
执行该文件时，将自动执行其中的命令。
When this is done the panes display a tab at the top.
重叠后的窗格将在顶部显示一个标签。
When this parameter is added, tag validation is done prior to translation/aligning.
添加此参数后，标签验证操作先于翻译/对齐进行。

When translating between RTL and LTR languages, correctly reading the tags from the source and entering them properly in the target may require the translator to toggle between LTR and RTL modes numerous times.
如需在自右向左和自左向右之间进行翻译工作，为从源文件中正确读取标签以及在目标中正确输入，有可能需要在自左向右和自右向左模式之间来回切换多次。
When translating software-related files: Allows you to configure the Tag Validator options to check also programming (%...) variables.
在翻译与软件关联的文件时：您可以通过标签验证器检验程序中的（%...）变量。
When using an external service you must be aware of the possible implications in terms of confidentiality, since you are loading the original document on a server outside of your direct control.
使用外部服务时您必须注意到可能的机密泄漏，因为您是在不受自己直接控制的服务器上加载文档的。
When using regular expressions, the replacement string supports references to groups defined in the search string.
当您使用正则表达式时，您可以在正则表达式中定义组别并指定要替换内容的组别。
When writing purely RTL text, the default (LTR) view may be used.
在编写纯自右向左文本时，将使用缺省的（自左向右）视图。
When you are ready to view the final product, you can export the translated files, open them in the appropriate application and view the translation in the final format...
如果您需要查看最终翻译成果，您可以导出已译文件，在相应的应用程序中打开，查看导出为最终格式的译文...

When you begin a new project on the same subject or for the same customer, navigate to the repository folder in the <g0>Project > Properties > Edit Project dialog</g0> and select it as the translation memory folder.
当您为同一主题或者客户启动一个新项目时，在<g0>项目 > 属性 > 编辑项目</g0>对话框找到该仓库文件夹，将其选中为翻译记忆文件夹。
When you create a translation project, OmegaT automatically creates a folder with the specified name, and a list of folders:
创建翻译项目时，OmegaT会自动创建一个您指定名称的文件夹和一系列文件夹：

When you create the target documents in an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project, the translation memory of the project is output in the form of three files in the root folder of your <a1>OmegaT</a1> project (see the above description).
在<a0>OmegaT</a0>项目中创建目标文档时，项目的翻译记忆记忆将会在<a1>OmegaT</a1>项目的根目录中输出三份文件（查阅之前的表述）。

tu.note: 这里的句点明显应用逗号

tuv.seg: When you left-click on the number, the selected script will run.
当您左键点击数字时，将运行选择的脚本。

When you let OmegaT know the files that you need to translate, it looks for the files it understands based on file filtering rules, recognizes the textual parts within them, splits up the text groups according to the segmentation rules, and displays the segments one by one so that you can proceed with the translation.
您可以通过设置选择需要翻译的文件，OmegaT可以通过文件过滤规则对文件进行查找，辨认文件中的文本部分，根据片段分割规则对文本进行分割，然后在编辑器中显示出待翻译的片段以供翻译。
When you load a segmented TTX file, segments with source = target will be included, if "Allow translation to be equal to source" in Options → Editing Behavior... has been checked.
当您加载片段化的TTX文件时，如果选中了选项→编辑行为...中的“允许译文和原文相同”选项时将会包含源文本与目标文本相同的片段。
When you move to another segment, the translation is validated and stored.
移动到另一个片段时，译文将被确认并保存。
When you move to the next segment, the first fuzzy match (the one with the best matching percentage) is automatically selected.
当您进入下一片段，第一个模糊匹配（拥有最高匹配百分比的那个）自动被选中。
When you translate your files, <a2>OmegaT</a2> stores all your progress in the translation memory <l3>project_save.tmx</l3> that resides in the project's <l4>/omegat</l4> subfolder.
在翻译文件时，<a2>OmegaT</a2>在项目的<l4>/omegat </l4>子文件夹的翻译记忆文件<l3>project_save.tmx</l3>中储存您所有的进度信息。
When you wish to use the filter again, just tick the check box.
如果之后您又决定使用这些过滤器，只需勾上这些复选框。
Whenever you finish a project, copy one of the three "export" translation memory files from the root folder of the project to the repository folder.
每当完成一个项目，将该三份“导出”翻译记忆从项目的根文件夹复制到仓库文件夹。

Whenever you want to see what your translation will look like in its final format, press <k2>Ctrl+D</k2> to generate the translated documents, which will be created in the <f3>/target/</f3> subfolder of your project folder.
当您想看看译文的最终格式时，按下<k2>Ctrl+D</k2>会生成已译文档，它们在项目文件夹中的<f3>/target/</f3>子文件夹。
Where circumstances permit, unifying used fonts, font sizes, colors, etc. should be considered, as it could simplify the translation and reduce the potential for tag errors.
如果有可能，应该尽可能考虑使用统一的字体、字体大小、颜色等，以此简化翻译工作和减少可能的标签错误。
Where possible, unifying the fonts, font sizes, colors, etc. used in the document simplifies the task of translation and reduces the possible number of tag errors.
如果有可能应该考虑在文档中使用统一的字体、字体大小、颜色等，以此简化翻译工作和减少可能的标签错误。
Where routine tasks are concerned, volunteers working on the OmegaT project are generally given as much freedom as possible in determining the form of their contribution.
在日常任务方面，从事OmegaT项目的志愿者通常会有尽可能多的自由来确定其贡献形式。.

Where two segments also have identical preceding and following segments (for example when an entire page appears twice in the text), they cannot be translated differently from each other in OmegaT, i.e. it is not possible to make one of them an "alternative translation".
有些情况，两个片段也会拥有相同的前后片段，（例如，当一整页内容在一篇文章中出现两次），在OmegaT中这两页无法被译成不同的版本，即无法为其中一页设置“可选译文”。

Whether or not it is adopted depends firstly upon whether the development team considers it beneficial to OmegaT, and secondly, upon whether one of the developers is willing to do the work of implementing it.
它是否被采用，首先取决于开发团队是否认为这是对OmegaT有利的，其次是开发人员是否愿意实现它。

While the translation is progressing, additional files (<e2><f3>project_name</f3></e2><f4>-omegat.tmx, project_name-level1.tmx and project_name-level2.tmx</f4>) are created (and updated during the process of translation) in this folder.
在翻译时会在此文件夹中创建（且在翻译过程中更新）附加文件（<e2><f3>project_name</f3></e2><f4>-omegat.tmx、project_name-level1.tmx和project_name-level2.tmx</f4>）。
Wildcards: Both exact and keyword searches support the wildcard characters * and ?.
通配符：精确搜索和关键字搜索均支持通配符 * 和 ?。
Will Helton: his final reading of the draft has spared me a lot of embarrassment.
Will Helton：他查看草稿后的决定省去了我一堆麻烦。
Will display a list of segments with tag errors and possible inconsistencies.
将会显示一份含有错误和可能不一致标签的片段清单。

Wind catches lily

Scatt'ring petals to the wind:

Your page is not found

Wind catches lily

Scatt'ring petals to the wind:

Windows and Linux users: if you are confident that your system already has a suitable version of the JRE installed, you can install the version of OmegaT without the JRE (this is indicated in the name of the version,"Without_JRE").
Windows 和 Linux 用户: 如果确信系统已经安装了合适的 JRE 版本，你可以安装不带 JRE 的 OmegaT 版本版本名称中标明为 without_JRE。
适用于Windows系统的可执行版本Toxic工具。
With <e3>TransTips/Exact Match </e3> checked, only complete words will be checked, otherwise parts of words will be matched as well.
选中<e3>翻译提示/精确匹配</e3>时只检查完整的单词，否则也会匹配部分单词。
With links to more detailed HOWTOs.
更详细的操作点击 链接。
With that option, no locking occurs.
在那种选项下，不会锁住。.
With this command you can move backward one segment at a time, to return later to the current segment using <g0>Forward in history... </g0>command below.
通过该命令一次可以返回一个片段，在稍后可使用下面的<g0>在编辑历史中前进...</g0>命令返回当前片段。
With this command you can step forward to the segment, you have previously left by the <g1>Back in history</g1>...command.
使用该命令可以前进到某片段，即您使用<g1>在编辑历史中回退...</g1>命令之前所处片段。
With this method, you may also download the "Windows without JRE" version, since the new installation will use your existing JRE.
使用这种方法您可以下载“不含 JRE 的 Windows” 版本，因为新的安装程序可以使用原来的 JRE。
Within a given language pair it is best to keep different subjects and/or clients as separate repositories as well.
在指定的语言对中最好像单独的版本库一样保存不同的主题及客户。
Within a segment, the first group (pair or single) receives the number 0, the second the number 1 etc.
在片段中，第一个组（成对或单个的）获得编号 0，第二个编号为 1，以此类推。
Work with more than 30 file formats
Writeable glossary file folder entered does not exist!
输入的可写术语表文件目录不存在！
Wrong response format from TaaS service
X, once or not at all
X 出现一次或根本不出现
YEAR is 4-digit year, MM is a month, DD day of the month, HH and NN are hours and minutes when the previous translation memory was saved.
YEAR 是 4 位数的年份；MM 是月份；DD 是日期；HH 和 NN 是前一份翻译记忆保存时的小时和分钟。
YEAR is the 4-digit year, MM is the month, DD the day of the month, and HH and NN are the hours and minutes when the previous translation memory was saved.
YEAR 是 4 位数的年份；MM 是月份；DD 是日期；而 HH 和 NN 是前一份翻译记忆保存时的小时和分钟。
Yandex Translate - No API Key Specified
Yandex 翻译——无指定API 密钥
You achieve the same by clearing the target segment and pressing <g4>Enter.</g4>
通过清楚目标片段并按下<g4>回车</g4>您可以实现相同的想过。
You are also free to copy it and pass it on to other people.
你可以免费复制，拷贝给他人。
You are going to modify {0} segments.
You are trying to use the HunspellTokenizer with the language {0}, but no spelling dictionaries are installed for this language.
您正试图在{0}语言中使用HunspellTokenizer，但该语言没有安装拼写词典。
You are uninstalling the spellchecking dictionary that your project currently uses.
要卸载的拼写检查词典当前项目正在使用中。
You can access that folder directly with the <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Access Configuration Folder</g2> </m0> menu entry.
你可以通过<m0> <g1>选项</g1> <g2>访问配置文件夹</g2> </m0>菜单条目，直接进入文件夹。
You can add <a0>OmegaT</a0> to your menus as follows:
可按下列步骤添加 <a0>OmegaT</a0> 到菜单中：

You can add a new term to the glossary by pressing <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0>, or copy existing glossaries to the <f1>/glossary/</f1> subfolder of your project folder, and OmegaT will automatically look up words in them.
按下<k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0>可以添加新术语到术语表，也可以复制现有的术语表到项目文件夹的<f1>/glossary/</f1>子文件夹，OmegaT会自动在其中搜索单词。
You can add new scripts there, so they will appear in the list of available scripts in the Scripting window.
您可以在这里添加新的脚本，这些脚本会出现在脚本窗口里的可用脚本列表里。
You can add the files to it later.
之后您也可添加文件到其中。
You can also "cd" there directly from the command line and open <a4><e5>Configuration.properties</e5> in a command line editor like emacs or vi</a4>.
你也可以直接使用命令行 "cd"，在命令行编辑器中打开 <a4><e5>Configuration.properties</e5> 如 emacs 或者 vi。</a4>.
You can also add source files from Internet pages, written in MediaWiki, by clicking on<g4> "Import from MediaWiki"</g4> button and providing the corresponding URL.
通过点击<g4>“从 MediaWiki 导入”</g4>按钮并输入相应的网址，您还可以添加互联网页中用MediaWiki编写的源文件。
You can also call up the user manual supplied with OmegaT without launching OmegaT itself.
用户也能在OmegaT未启动时调用用户手册。
You can also enable project-specific file filters, which will only be used on the current project, by selecting the <e1>File Filters...</e1> option in Project Properties.
通过选择项目属性中的<e1>文件过滤器...</e1>属性，您还可以启用仅用于当前项目的项目专用文件过滤器。
You can also file <u6>bug reports</u6> and <u7>requests for enhancements.</u7>
您还可以提交 <u6>bug 报告</u6>和<u7>改进要求。</u7>
You can also have several search windows open simultaneously.
可以同时打开多个搜索窗口。
You can also highlight your preferred alternative in the glossary pane and insert it into the target by right clicking on the selection.
您可以让术语表窗格中的首选译文突出显示，并通过右键点击选区来将它插入目标片段中。
You can also instruct the spell checker to ignore all the occurrences of the mis-spelled word, or add it to the dictionary.
此外，您也可以要求拼写检查器忽略所有该词的出现，或者把它添加到字典。
You can also launch it from the Spotlight search field.
您还可以在Spotlight搜索区域中进行调用。
You can also manually drag the file OmegaT.exe to the start menu, the desktop or the quick launch area to link it from there.
您也可以手动将 OmegaT.exe 文件拖动到开始菜单、桌面或快速启动栏，以将其链接到该处。
You can also use AppleScript or Automator to create Services or scripts that will automate frequent actions
您还可以使用 AppleScript 或 Automator 创建能够自动频繁查询的服务或脚本
You can ask the user group for advice if you have problems.
如果遇到麻烦，可以向用户组垂询。
You can browse through notes using <g0>GoTo → Next Note</g0> and <g1>GoTo → Previous Note</g1>.
您可通过<g0>前往→后一笔记</g0>和<g1>前往→前一笔记</g1>以浏览笔记。
You can change or add filename patterns for files to be handled by each file filter.
您可以更改或添加文件名模式，以便通过每个文件过滤器处理文件。
You can change the already assigned shortcuts and add new shortcuts by putting a shortcut definition file in your OmegaT preferences folder (see <l0>User files location</l0>).
通过 OmegaT 首选项文件夹（请参阅<l0>用户文件位置</l0>）中的快捷键定义文件，您可改变已分配的快捷键或添加新的快捷键。
You can change the position of any pane or even undock it to a separate window by clicking and dragging the pane by its name.
您可以改变任何窗格的位置，甚至可以通过点击和拖动窗格的名称将其变成独立的窗口。
You can check that yourself by selecting the item <e0>File Filters</e0> in the menu <e1>Options</e1>.
可以通过在<e1>选项</e1>菜单中选择<e0>文件过滤器</e0>菜单项来检查是不是这样。
You can create a new project for each new job, and you can add new source files to a project at anytime.
你可以为每一份新工作创建一个新项目，可以在任何时候增添新的源文档到项目中。
You can create glossary entries with Create Glossary Entry in the Edit menu.
可以通过 编辑 菜单中的 创建词条 命令创建词条。
You can create glossary entries with Create Glossary Entry in the Edit menu.
您可以使用编辑菜单的创建术语表条目来创建。
You can customize existing shortcuts or add new ones according to your needs.
您可以根据自己的需要自定义现有的或增加新的快捷键。
You can decide not to check at all, check for simple printf variables (like %s %d etc) or for print variables of all types.
您可以决定是否检查、检查简单的printf变量（如%s %d等）或检查所有类型的printf变量。
You can decide not to translate such segments at all.
您可以决定完全不翻译这样的片段。
You can define one of the alternative - for instance the most probable among them - as default translation by selecting <g1>Edit → Use as Default Translation</g1>
您可以通过<g1>编辑→用作默认译文</g1>指定某个可选译文（例如其中可能性最大的译文）为默认译文。
You can disable the auto-propagation function with Project > Properties > uncheck the "Auto-propagation of Translations" box.
你可以通过项目>属性>取消勾选“翻译自动传输”选框，停用自动传输功能。

You can either copy files manually, i.e. from elsewhere on your system, using your file manager; or you can use OmegaT's <e0>"Install new dictionary"</e0> function to provide a list of available dictionaries to select from.
您可以使用文件管理器从其他位置手动复制文件，或使用 OmegaT 的<e0>“安装”</e0>功能来提供可选择的词典列表。
You can either enter the source and target languages by hand or use the drop down menus.
您可以手动输入语种或者通过下拉菜单选择。
You can enable project specific filters via the <e0>Project → Properties...</e0>.
通过<e0>项目→属性...</e0>您可以启用项目专用过滤器。
You can find detailed statistic information in the file: {0}
可在文件: {0} 中找到更详细的统计信息
You can find the text of the license in /docs/OmegaT-license.txt.
你可以在此找到证书的文本： /docs/OmegaT-license.txt.
You can go to the <a0>home page</a0> and hopefully find the information you need from there.
前往 <a0>首页</a0> 希望你能查找到有用信息
You can have as many "alternative translations" as you like of identical segments, but there can only be one default translation (or none at all).
你可以为相同片段设置多种“可选翻译”，但只能有一种默认翻译（或完全没有）。
You can have entries with the target column missing, i.e. just containing the source term and the comment.
您可以添加目标列为空的条目，即只包含源术语和注释。
You can have several Search windows open at the same time, but close them when they are no longer needed so that they do not clutter your desktop.
您可以同时打开多个搜索窗口，但别忘记在不需要时关闭它们，这样它们才不会弄乱您的桌面。
You can have the source text inserted automatically into the editing field.
您可以将源文本自动插入编辑区域
You can however obtain a neater and more user-friendly installation by using the installation script (linux-install.sh).
不过您可以使用安装脚本（linux-install.sh）进行更整洁和友好的安装。
You can launch OmegaT from the command line with a script that includes start-up options or you can click on <e0><a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar</e0> to launch it directly.
可直接在命令行中通过包含命令行启动参数的脚本启动 OmegaT，或直接点击 <e0><a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar</e0> 启动它。
You can modify OmegaT's behaviour by editing the <e0>Properties</e0> as well as the <e1>Configuration.properties</e1> file in the package.
你可以通过编辑 <e0>Properties</e0>以及<e1>组件中的Configuration.properties</e1> 文件来修改OmegaT的行为。
You can open them in an Internet browser to obtain access to external links.
您可在网络浏览器中打开它们以访问其外部链接。
You can overlap panes if desired.
需要时您可以重叠窗格。
You can process the generated tmx with any tool you want.
可以使用任何工具处理生成的 tmx 文件。
You can quickly see their contents by looking at their title: it will contain the search term used.
通过标题您可以快速了解它们的搜索内容：标题中包含了搜索用词。

You can regard these three tmx files (<f2>-omegat.tmx</f2>, <f3>-level1.tmx</f3> and <f4>-level2.tmx</f4>) as an "export translation memory", i.e. as an export of your current project's content in bilingual form.
可将这三份 TMX 文件（<f2>-omegat.tmx</f2>，<f3>-level1.tmx</f3> 和 <f4>-level2.tmx</f4>）视为一份“导出的翻译记忆”，即当前项目的可导出双语形式。
You can select which elements are to be translated.
您可以选择要翻译的元素。
You can select which of the following items are to be translated:
您可以选择要翻译下列哪些项：
You can start the selected macros from the main menu as well by using their entries in the <g0>Tools </g0>menu or by pressing<k1> Ctrl+Alt+F#</k1> (# 1 to 12).
您还可以点击<g0>工具</g0>菜单下的脚本条目或按<k1> Ctrl+Alt+F#</k1>（#表示1到12）组合键运行选择的宏。
You can then click on the preferred translation to insert it into the target segment at the current position.
接着可以点击喜欢的翻译来将其插入目标片段的当前位置。
You can then launch the Kaptain launch script with:
然后您可以这样运行Kaptain启动脚本：
You can then switch back to the Search window for the next segment found, for instance to check and, if necessary, correct the terminology.
然后您可以转回搜索窗口以编辑找到的下一个片段，例如进行检查或者在必要时调整术语。
You can think of LanguageTool as a software to detect errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect, e.g. mixing up there/their, no/now etc.

You can thus select a word anywhere in <a2>OmegaT</a2> and use Services to check this word, for instance in Spotlight or in Google.
因此，您可以在 <a2>OmegaT</a2> 的任何地方选择一个单词，然后使用在 Spotlight 或谷歌提供的服务查阅该词。
You can toggle between different display modes by pressing <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0> (this is the letter O and not the numeral 0).

You can use <g3>Ctrl+A <i4/></g3><g5>, Ctrl+C <i6/></g5>, <g7>Ctrl+V <i8/></g7> to copy/paste the contents.
